notes: 熱水爐需入房時按下按鈕, 按鈕在電燈及空調按鈕旁, 大約待十分鐘後, 進入衛浴扭動花灑開關調節水溫, 需留意轉向藍色方向是熱水, 轉向紅色方向才是冷水啊, 謝謝!!
house_rules: 不允許攜帶寵物 禁止吸煙､舉辦派對或活動 可於14:00後隨時入住,退房時間為12:00前

reviews.comments:
其他评论里都提到过,房间略小但一应俱全,位置好楼下是庙街可以逛,房东也热情好沟通,整体还不错｡提醒下自备拖鞋牙刷,房间有个电源转换头｡楼下电梯锁房东提供钥匙,外门锁和内门锁是密码锁,个人入睡较敏感,能听到外面其他房间以及窗户外的细微声音,也还能接受｡另外,提醒下热水器是储水式,水温烧到85℃后连续出水十分钟就变凉水了,需要再等烧热再洗｡

最后会考虑再次入住｡

外面是比较旧的大楼,但是里面的装修和设施都很新很干净,空间算不错了,可以打开两个行李箱而且不影响活动,桌子是折叠的,空间利用率高,热水器只要水量不要开的特别大,洗澡洗头还是很充足的,位置很好就在油麻地地铁边上,楼下很多吃的店铺和便利店,离弥敦道也非常近,位置非常好,对外部的隔音比较好,关上窗户基本没声音,但是房间之间的隔音会差一点,隔壁房间电吹风,热水器烧水,淋浴声会比较吵,还好隔壁回来的比较早,不影响休息｡
Value for money, good location

name: Cozy open space Mile-End Apartment
summary: Cozy apartment in the heart of the Mile-End. Lots of lighting, simply decorated, and full of plants. Liveliest neighborhood of the city with cafes, restos, grocery stores, pharmacies and public transportation. Mont-Royal Parc just a 10 min walk.  The apartment is simple providing all your basic needs, with an open space concept for the living, dining room and kitchen.  P.S. This is an old Montreal building/apartment that hasn't been renovated in a while.

neighborhood_overview: One of the best neighborhoods of the city, full of cafes, restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacies, and much more. Very multicultural neighborhood, where mostly everyone speaks English and French (possibly a third language).  Downtown is a 10 minute bus ride, and a 10 minute walk down the street you arrive at the Mont-Royal park, beautiful to take walks and explore the mountain ( no matter what the season is).
transit: Bus stop right on the street corner below the apartment. The 80 bus passes every 10 minutes and takes you directly to the green line metro (Place des Arts)  or blue line metro (Parc Metro). Taxi stand also right beneath the apartment building, and the city is full of UBER drivers. Everything you need is walking distance from my apartment.  Parking on my street (Park Avenue) is a PAID parking only. You may find free street parking on streets around my area, but must be VERY careful that there is no RESERVED sign.
access: The guests have access to everything that is in the apartment. That includes; kitchen (fully equipped), bathroom/shower, living room, dining room and a private bedroom.

Hello there! Born and raised in Montreal, I have been travelling all over the world for about 8 years now.  As a guest, I am very respectful of one's personal space and careful as if it was my own. As a host, I want people to feel comfortable in my apartment and have the best local experience.  

Je parle aussi le francais. Hablo espanol. Behki 3arabi.

name: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Sagrada Familia Suites - 2 Bedroom 2 Bathrooms Apartment
space: This beautiful early 20th century modernist property is located right next to Avinguda Gaudí and just 200 meters from the Sagrada Família.  The building includes 17 spacious apartments which were completely refurbished from the hand of Eric Vökel. Furthermore, it is located in Barcelona's Eixample neighborhood, next to all types of retail stores and dozens of eating terraces for either lunch or dinner. The metro station is right on the corner and connects you to any point of the city. Large 70m2 apartment with two double bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of which is en-suite to the master bedroom. It also has a living room with a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony. Ideal for unforgettable moments spent in great company. Total sleeping capacity: 6 people (double sofa bed for 2 guest) For stays of 4 nights or more, there is a cleaning service every 4 days. Additional cleaning services can be booked at an extra cost.  Apartments include bed linen and towels.

access: Personalised concierge service opening hours are from 09:00 to 18:00.  If you arrive outside reception opening hours, you can use the check-in machine using the information on your booking confirmation. Please contact us if you believe you are going to arrive later than 18:00 and we will send you instructions on how to use our automatic check-in machine.  Guests can store their luggage at the hotel if they arrive before check-in hours.
interaction: The reception is open from 9 am to 6 pm. During the openning hours, the guest can request everything he might need regarding any city attraction doubts, directions or any request for their apartment.
house_rules: -Smoking is forbidden in all our apartments. -Pets allowed up to 10 kilos without fees. -Children under 3 years will sleep free sharing bed with parents or in baby cot on request. -At the end of the stay, the customer undertakes to leave the apartment and all its assets in the same conditions as they were received, being all damages or losses replacement payable by the costumer. For such purpose and as a guarantee for this obligation, the guest authorizes the hotel to charge 200€ in case of damages or losses.

host.host_about:
Born in Copenhagen, architecture and design are my life. I regularly work with major Nordic design studios and during one of my trips, I stopped off in Barcelona: I was captivated by its architecture, culture and Mediterranean colour. Such was the impact the city had on me that I decided to stay and carry on my latest project: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments. 

Each of the apartments has been personally designed and decorated by me,  as if they might become my own home.

"Welcome home!"

Eric Vökel, 
Arquitect and designer

name: BCN11# Double room with bathroom A/C

The apartment is centrally located 15 meters away from the bus station and 40 meters away from the metro station. The bus and metro takes you to Las Rambla, Boqueria Market, Plaza Colon, Plaza Catalunya, Plaza España, etc. in 5-15 minutes.

You have your own PRIVATE bathroom OUTSIDE the bedroom that is only for you. You will be staying in an apartment with 2 other people maximum. The kitchen and living room will be shared with these 2 other individuals. There is a maximum of 2 people per room (4 in total in the apartment) and nobody is allowed to bring anyone else inside the apartment. Only the 4 guests, the host (Rebecca, Cristina, Angela, Roberto) and the cleaning staff will be allowed to enter this apartment. The apartment has an elevator and you can enter and exit the building from the ground floor 0 or by the underground parking.

name: Oma'oma'o Falls ~ Pristine Private Home
summary: Oma'oma'o means green in the Hawaiian language. We chose this name because when you arrive here, you are surrounded by lush green tropical rainforest. The colors of emerald green and brilliant blue accompanied by fragrant scents and sounds of waterfalls permeate your senses. You have arrived in paradise. Top this off with high-end, brand new accommodations. Located in Hilo town, an ideal landing pad to explore all of east Hawaii.  Spend days relaxing at home or adventuring, your choice!
space: You will love how open and bright this home is. Natural lighting fills every room. The construction of this home was designed with special attention to every detail. The sinks are made from beautiful copper, all of the cabinets were made by a local furniture maker with beautiful native woods.  There are so many cozy places throughout the home to lounge and rest and simply enjoy the incredible jungle views. From inside the home to out on the lanais (Hawaiian for balcony), you can rest comfortably.  Do you need a soak in an over-sized jacuzzi tub with jets? If so, we have you covered. Enjoy your own personal spa experience in the master suite, which also has a walk-in shower, double sinks, and vanity area.  Are you interested in exploring the abundance of local produce and fresh meats that Hawaii island has to offer? If so, we have all that you need in the kitchen to prepare local style feasts at home. You are also right in Hilo town and have easy access to some of the island's best rest

neighborhood_overview: Oma'oma'o Falls is in the private, secluded neighborhood called Reed's Island. This is a special neighborhood right in Hilo, surrounded on both sides by rivers, streams, and countless waterfalls. Luckily, on our side of the street, the water is clean and safe for swimming.  Many visitors love walking the neighborhood street to admire the historic homes and flower and fruit tree filled yards. Hilo town is within walking distance, 20-30 mins each way.  Volcano National Park is 30 mins away. The beaches of Hilo, with their lava rock coastline and turquoise waters are within 10 mins.
notes: Please be advised that the yard is still a work in progress and is therefore a bit rugged to get around. Also, as our guest, you must accept 100% responsibility of your person and your possessions and release all liabilities from the homeowner.
transit: You will want a car to access the local destinations. Walking from the house is quite enjoyable, but more ideal for sight seeing.
access: You have complete access to the home, property, and beautiful - swimmable waterfall.
interaction: We are currently living in California, but will provide you with our local contacts when your reservation is confirmed. You may always contact me via email, text, or call and we will immediately respond and help with whatever you might need. Enjoy the convenience of self check-in and check-out.
house_rules: - Quiet time 10pm-7am. Please remove shoes before entering home.

host.host_about: Aloha I have lived in Hilo for over 10 years. I’m currently in California finishing my naturopathic doctoral studies.

reviews.comments: WOW! This place is a magical jungle oasis! You actually feel like you are in the jungle with sounds of frogs lulling you to sleep every night. We woke up every morning to the sunrise off the top balcony. The house had all the amenities we needed. We cooked at home for almost every meal and enjoyed the views of the jungle from the screen lanai. We also hiked down to the private swimming hole and waterfall below the house and it was so serene! Be sure to take the path along the right side with the railing; it was SO worth the 5-minute trek! This house is also in the perfect location where you feel remote but you are able to walk into town, which we did every day to go to the farmers market and the kombucha bar. We highly recommend and will definitely be coming back!

Beautiful, brand new, and nicely furnished house with stunning views from the upstairs and downstairs balconies. My girlfriend and I spent 4 nights in Hilo and this place was exactly what we were looking for. We enjoyed meals and coffee on the back screened-in porch and loved the spacious tiled showers, the jacuzzi bath tub in the upstairs master, and the incredible wood finish throughout the whole house. There is also a waterfall located on the property, just a short walk down the hill. Only a 10 minute walk to downtown Hilo, and a 5-10 minute drive to Honoli’i beach which is a great beginner - intermediate surf spot. If you are looking to get away with your significant other or a small group of friends, I would highly recommend this jungle getaway.
Stylish, clean house in a quiet neighborhood. Close to central Hilo. Would stay here again.

The home itself is beautiful as is the surrounding jungle. Take the time to visit the waterfall and beautiful pool just a short trip down the path from the home. You will not regret it! The neighborhood is quiet and friendly.  We found the home clean and in good order when we arrived. As it turns out, our favorite perk of this home was the master bed mattress! What a lovely treat to have a great nights sleep each night! The home stayed cool with the fans and windows and we never wanted for any air conditioning. The proximity to Hilo also made this home a great choice for us. It was nice to be so close to town but also feel as though we weren't in the city.

We had such a great stay! We loved the safe neighborhood, the lovely waterfall, and the balconies. The home itself is gorgeous, and had plenty of space for my husband and I - it could easily hold another couple or a family.

The property is not far from the Hilo farmer's market, and the kitchen was equipped with everything we needed to make meals with our purchases. We also enjoyed coffee on the screened-in porch several times.

We did have a couple of questions throughout our stay, and Sierra was quick to respond via text and email. Overall, we would highly recommend Sierra's place. We will definitely book it again if we are in the area!

Sierra is a great host and has a wonderful home in a perfect location 5 mins from town.  The nights have built in relaxing nature sounds that will surely help you unwind and relax, the many bird songs under the night stars is perfect.

The jacuzzi tub is a very nice added bonus, a great way to relax after a day out.  On Sat, the farmers market less than a mile away is full of incredible fruits and veg with other souvenirs and things.  Location wise in general is perfect to explore this side of the island.  A bit north is the Tropical Botanical Gardens, a bit south to Volcano National Park and some other impressive coastlines and black sand beaches.  Highly recommend this space for a relaxing getaway in Hilo.
We highly recommend staying at Sierra’s! It’s apparent the host takes pride in the small touches that make a stay great. Super modern and spacious. Couldn’t ask for more. Would return!

name: Cozy 2BR condo in Montreal Downtown
summary: Luxury two-bedroom unit in the heart of downtown Montreal located in one of the most famous streets (Maisonneuve Ouest) and surrounded by wonderful bars. It is steps away from an endless list of grocery stores, shops, clubs and restaurants. My place is suitable for couples, adventurers, business travellers, families (with kids) and groups. You will love my place because of the neighborhood, the ambiance and the magnificent view of all over downtown Montreal.
space: This is a beautifully designed condo, with two closed bedrooms and a huge living area. The condo is located in a very famous street.

host.host_about: Professional and passionate by traveling

reviews.comments: Kyle’s place was amazing. My friends and I had a great time in downtown Montreal. The condo was surrounded by wonderful bars and restaurants. Location is perfect and view is spectacular. I definitely recommend Kyle’s place!

Nice apartment in downtown. A lot to do in the area! Host was very helpful with any doubt that we had and his place has an unbeatable location, it’s near metro, bus and fun places! I really recommend this place if you visit Montreal, you will get anything you need to enjoy your stay!
This will be my home in Montreal. Outstanding experience. I highly recommend this place. Great location and the host were super friendly and accommodating
Great host , great location and comfortable apartment.

Nice location. Nice rooms. Host was efficient to communicate with. We used the 2 bedrooms and had my older daughter sleeping on the living room hide a bed which is more suited to sit on it than to sleep on it. If you want more place to sleep, I suggest you bring a air matress.

Check-in process was less than ideal. Was told to go to someone's apartment (not the host) to pick up the keys. When we arrived at the Airbnb's location, we had a very difficult time finding parking despite the host telling us that there is plenty of free parking available. The building itself was under heavy construction (wires hanging down from the ceiling in the lobby, clutter in the hallways, etc...). The unit's floors were dirty including in the bathroom, the bedsheets were stained, we found hair in bedding, the heat was very high with no way to control the temperature, and one of the kitchen cabinet doors came off entirely when opened. The mattresses can barely even be called mattresses as they were extremely uncomfortable with minimal support. The pillows were as flat as flat can be (either very poor quality or extremely old). Needless to say, we did NOT enjoy our stay despite the host's "Superhost" status. Would not stay with this host again.

reviews.comments: Great place
Great location! I would go back anytime!
We had a great time. The space was great for 4 people and was very close to the bell centre and old Montreal - lots to see and do!
We loved our stay at Moss’s place. Great location. Simple access. The bedrooms were bigger than I expected and the place is well decorated.

The photos did not match the place we stayed, and when I asked about it the response was that that didn't make sense the photos should have matched and that he would get to the bottom of it and get back to me, but never did.

Thanks Moss and Yan for a clean and comfortable stay at your airbnb. Your stylish home is sure to be the wanted reservation for many other young adults in the future. Some things to note could be the somewhat unstable toilet and shower door the does not close fully. Please also note that despite the wonderfully new TV, there was no audio output. Overall, a great stay and would be happy to return. Location is also very convenient and close to bank, grocery store and parking lot. Great small home for groups of 4, clean and modern and reasonably priced.

neighborhood_overview: El barrio tiene varios supermercados y bares y es muy tranquilo.
notes: Se ruega silencio a partir de las 22 hs. Desayuno: consiste en café con leche o té y una pasta o tostadas con mermelada. En estancias mayores de un mes el desayuno no está incluido debido a que esta modalidad de estancia ya tiene un descuento del 50%.// Lavadora: es gratuita 1 lavadora en estancias a partir de 4 días y una vez a la semana en estancias largas. Lavadoras adicionales se cobrarán. Ropa de cama y toallas se lavaran gratuitamente y se cambiarán una vez a la semana. // Cocina: Todos los huéspedes pueden usar microondas para calentar algo o la cocina para comer.  // La vivienda no es adaptada para niños pequeños, tampoco apto para personas con problemas de movilidad o ancianos
transit: Está muy cerca del metro (sólo 2 min), y en solo 15 min está en el centro de Barcelona y muy cerca de las atracciones turísticas.  Casi siempre se encuentra aparcamiento en la calle si viene en coche.
access: Cocina y baño
house_rules: HOUSE RULES  It is forbidden to get drunk, to smoke in the house, listening to loud music and bringing pets. No showers between 11pm to 7am. Silence from 10 pm. No eat inside the rooms (breakfast, lunch or dinner).

reviews.comments: Gabriela was so nice and extremely helpful. We had a great time at her place. The room was beautiful and the location was very convenient (a walking distance from Parc del Forum, where we wanted to go).

It was sooo nice living with Gabriela. She and her children are very friendly, kind, helpful people and very fun to hang out with also. The place is very clean, good-looking and it is very close to yellow and purple metro lines. I was very happy to stay here, there were no problems about the place and the people at all. I recommend this place to everyone who wants to enjoy barcelona with such lovely people. We even lit firecrackers on Sant Joan festival together, and it was fun!

Gabriela è stata fin da subito molto gentile nell'accoglierci e disponibile a chiarire qualsiasi nostro dubbio e nel darci consigli utili per tutto quel che c'è da sapere di Barcellona, per agevolare il più possibile la nostra vacanza, che ha avuto una durata di una settimana, dal 6 al 13 Agosto 2014...
Arrivare nel quartiere dove è ubicata l'abitazione è stato piuttosto facile e la descrizione riportata da Gabriela, in merito a come arrivare a casa sua, quali autobus e linee metropolitane prendere, è di per se molto precisa ed esauriente...ed arrivare nel centro di barcellona è davvero molto facile, in particolare con la metropolitana che dista neanche 5 minuti a piedi dall'appartamento e ci si impiega meno di 10 minuti per arrivare da li al centro di barcellona...
L'appartamento è bello e tenuto pulito ed in ordine, così come le camere da letto che, personalmente, ho trovato molto confortevoli...
Unico neo, forse, è rappresentato dalla cucina, un po piccola per più di 3/4 persone, ma tutto sommato nulla di tragico...
Detto ciò, il mio parere è più che positivo e spero di poter tornare quanto prima a Barcellona, anche solo per un fine settimana !!!
Grazie ancora per tutto, Gabriela...
Saluti :)

Nous sommes allés à Barcelone et avons passé une très bonne semaine chez Gabriela. L'appartement est agréable et chacun garde son entière indépendance. Gabriela ainsi que ses enfants sont d'une excellente compagnie, c'est donc un logement que nous conseillons vivement.

Gabriela and her children are very nice and kind. She helped me with every thing I needed and guided me during my trip. 
The room was clean, tidy and comfortable. In addition, the house is close to the Metro station.

Gabriela y sus hijos son muy agradables y amables. Ella me ayudó con todo lo que necesitaba y me guio durante mi viaje. 
La habitación estaba limpia, ordenada y cómoda. 
Además la casa está cerca de la estación de metro.

mon séjour chez Gabriela c'est très bien passé, elle était toujours là pour me renseigner sur les transports ou les endroits a voir a Barcelone. le quartier est vraiment paisible et à 2 pas du (Website hidden by Airbnb) y a aussi des bus de nuits mais quand on ne connait pas bien la ville ce n'est pas facile de se repérer la nuit donc de ce fait je n'ai pas expérimenté les bus de nuit...sans doute la prochaine fois. la chambre était propre et bien entretenue et même si le lit me paraissait petit, j'y ai très bien dormi durant mon séjour. il y avait une très bonne connection wifi, et çà pour moi c'était très important. j'ai pu également cuisiner et concocter un menu pour Gabriela et ses enfants et çà, c'était (Website hidden by Airbnb) pouvoir manger tous ensembles...comme en famille...merci encore a Gabriella pour sa gentillesse et son hospitalité..!!!

We had a nice stay in Gabriela's house, it's close to the metro.The Gabriela's family is nice and friendly.Although we don't have too much conversation because of we can't speak Spanish.But we still thanks the Gabriela's family.

Gabriela es una persona atenta y agradable, te explica en detalle las posibilidades que tiene la zona de supermercados, transporte... etc..

El piso es muy acogedor tiene parquet de madera, calefacción y la zona es bastante tranquila. La zona es de aparcamiento gratuito yo conseguí aparcar varias veces prácticamente delante de la puerta.

Notre séjour chez Gabriella c'est très bien passé, toujours présente pour répondre à nos questions, et nous donner de précieux conseils. Les chambres étaient confortables, le wifi fonctionne très bien. Le centre est à environ 30 minutes en métro, la plage à 20 minutes à pied. Nous conseillons cet appartement, merci Gabriella et sa famille.

Nous avons passé 4 jours superbes à Barcelone et en partie grâce à Gabriela, une hote fort sympatique. Elle nous a aidé à notre arriver en nous donnant une carte et nous expliquant les meilleurs endroits. L'appartement est plutot petit mais il y a le nécessaire et c'est propre. Le matin nous avions droit à un petit déjeuner très agréable ! 
L'appartement est situé a 5 minutes de 2 lignes de metro donc très pratique ! Le quartier est plutot calme mais il y a ce qu'il faut (des restau, des banques...).
Si vous chercher un endroit pour dormir entre deux promenades en ville, c'est l'idéal ! Mais n'hésitez pas à discuter avec Gabriela, elle a plein d'anecdotes de voyage à raconter !
Gabriela's home was beautifully decorated and furnished. We felt so welcome! She made a great effort to meet our needs. We were very happy with our stay in her home.

The apartment is very comfortable, just like at home.  At that time we were very late to arrive, but the host still wait for us to check in. It is very nice. And she provide us some tips,metro's map,city touring guide and so on.

Gabriela was a good host kindly and very discreet. The place was exactly as it what supposed to be. The subway was really near from there and the neighborhood was quietly with a few shops with simples commodities. It's not a place to make party in Barcelona but we were here with a colleague for work, so it was ok.

Séjour très agréable chez Gabriela! Metro à proximité et bien servi dans la ville. Gabriela se montre très accueillante et très compréhensive malgré notre faible niveau en espagnol ! :) je recommande!

Gabriella est une femme très agréable, aimable, qui nous a accueilli chaleureusement pendant le séjour, elle était toujours là pour nous donner des renseignements et des indications sur les places les plus connues à Barcelone, sa petite maison comporte tout ce que tu auras besoin, on vivait comme une famille qui se connait depuis longtemps, surtout avec son fils et sa fille Georgina, on a pu construire une relation solide.
Merci pour tout , et on se verra prochainement

La anfitriona nos dio pautas para desplazarnos dentro de la ciudad, tuvimos libertad para usar los ambientes del departamento, el ambiente era grato, nos mantuvieron limpios los cuartos y tuvimos la facilidad de lavar nuestra ropa, hablan minimarkets cerca al departamento y dos estaciones de tren cerca, en general la anfitriona fue muy amable con nosotros durante nuestra estadía.
Superlimpia y supertranquila, 100% recomendable!!, Gabriela es un encanto de anfitriona.

Gabriela es muy buena anfitriona. La habitacion es comoda. Gabriela orienta muy bien, no se pierde uno y hasta me regalo 2 mapas. Muy segura su casa. Atencion de primera. Desayuno en la mañana. Lo recomiendo a todos. Yo quisiera en mi proxima visita alquilarme otra vez aqui.

Gabriela accepted my last min request and she was there with her family.  The room was same aa photo though the aircon was strategically located between three rooms and hence better to keep room's door open for full enjoyment of air conditioner.  Her daughter was very kind and even prepared two piece of toasts for me next morning as breakfast.  Her son was really cute and lovely.
Gabriela es una persona muy amable y disponible
La famiglia più gentile ed ospitale che abbia mai trovato, sempre a disposizione e cordiali in ogni momento.. Ci ritornerò sicuramente

Je suis resté 4 nuits chez Gabriella avec un ami et nous avons passé un très bon moment ! 
En effet, la maison est propre. Gabriella est prête à répondre à toutes les questions, elle est très gentille et s'investit complètement pour que tout nous paraisse agréable. Le petit déjeuner était convenable. Enfin bien que le quartier ne soit pas en pleins centre, cela ne pose aucun problème car le metro est tout proche et il est très rapide de se déplacer par cette voie.
Merci pour tout Gabriella et à bientôt :)

Gabriela is friendly and kind person, I felt myself very comfortable in her apartment and I had everything that I need for living for 4 days. Apartment is clean and has good furniture. The house is located near Metro (around 5 minutes). Thank you very much Gabriela!

Estuve en casa de Gabriela casi durante tres meses en Barcelona yv estuve muy cómoda. Ahora tengo una familia adoptiva en Barcelona. He cenado con ellos varios viernes por la noche y compartido (Website hidden by Airbnb) El departamento es pequeño, la conexión de wifi muy buena y hay 2 metros cerca por lo qur se puede llegar a cualquier partre de barcelona en 40 minutos. Recomendable!

Gabriela fue muy amable, respetuosa y buena anfitriona desde el primer día de mi estancia. El departamento muy cómodo, con todas las instalaciones necesaria para la estadía. Lugar recomendable para alojarse! Gracias Gabriela.

Gabriela ha sido muy amable y atenta en todo momento de mi estadía en Barcelona. El apartamento se encuentra cerca de las estaciones de metro y cuenta con todo lo necesario para pasar una estadía estupenda. Sin dudas volvería a venir!
Gracias Gabriela por la hospitalidad. Todo ha sido muy agradable. Volvería a alojarme nuevamente una próxima vez
You are renting room or rooms at this place. The host lives in this appartment. If you have any question she is ready to answer and help you.
El apartamento es tal cual lo muestran las fotos. De fácil acceso al transporte público. Gabriela y sus hijos han sido muy amables en todo momento. Lo recomiendo
Logement idéal pour court séjour (2-3 nuits) quand même loin des attractions. Partager le logement avec les résidents ce n'est pas pour tout le monde.
Confortable place and good location.

"Con una anfitriona atenta a los detalles, mi estadia en la casa de Gabriela fue excelente, pues siempre estuvo abierta a la negociacion en caso de dudas y a proporcionar informacion acerca del barrio y la ciudad en general. Sus hijos muy cordiales y educados, hicieron mi estadia muy amena y sentir calor de hogar. La habitacion muy confortable: cama en excelente condicion, espacio para objetos personales y ropa suficientes. El cuarto de baño limpio, con agua caliente todo el tiempo y comodidad en la ducha-bañera. El ambiente desde el pasillo de circulación con calefaccion efectiva que mantuvo temperatura calida dia y noche. La cocina disponible, con espacio en congelador que me permitio cocinar mis alimentos a tiempo y con comodidad. Recomiendo ampliamente a Gabriela como anfitriona, ya sea para estadias cortas o largas".

We (3 guests) had an amazing first airbnb experience thanks to Gabriela. The apartment is very close to a metro station and situated in a quiet area - thus it's a great place for guest who want to explore Barcelona and need a comfortable place to rest. 
Gabriela is a very friendly, caring, thoughtful host who makes sure that you feel home and are having a great time while staying with her.  One day I felt sick, stayed in the apartment and she offered to prepare me some food and tea - special thanks for this very kind gesture :) 
I also want to mention that the communication with the host was fantastic and thanks to the good directions, it was easy to find the place. We certainly would love to stay at this place again. Highly recommended!

La estadía donde Gabriela fue muy agradable. El apartamento es cómodo y muy limpio. Gabriela es una anfitriona muy amable y atenta, que responderá a cualquier duda y que sabrá darte consejos útiles. La ubicación está muy bien, sobre todo para nosotros que estábamos de congreso e íbamos todos los días al centro de convenciones. name: Acogedor loft en Barcelona
summary: El apartamento está completamente equipado y decorado pensando en crear un espacio cálido, acogedor, seguramente especial, perfecto para divertirse y disfrutar de Barcelona con todas las comodidades. Sólo está disponible los fines de semana de junio, julio y agosto.
space: Amplio y moderno apartamento situado en una céntrica calle de Sants, junto al metro, autobuses y a pocos minutos de la estación de tren y aeropuerto. Está muy bien ubicado para aquellos que quieren explorar Barcelona y los alrededores: al lado mismo de Montjuic, de los principales museos, de la Plaza España y de los teatros de la avenida del Paral.lel y el Camp Nou.
description: El apartamento está completamente equipado y decorado pensando en crear un espacio cálido, acogedor, seguramente especial, perfecto para divertirse y disfrutar de Barcelona con todas las comodidades. Sólo está disponible los fines de semana de junio, julio y agosto. Amplio y moderno apartamento situado en una céntrica calle de Sants, junto al metro, autobuses y a pocos minutos de la estación de tren y aeropuerto. Está muy bien ubicado para aquellos que quieren explorar Barcelona y los alrededores: al lado mismo de Montjuic, de los principales museos, de la Plaza España y de los teatros de la avenida del Paral.lel y el Camp Nou. Las atracciones mas cercanas al apartamento son: MNAC (Museo Nacional de arte de Cataluña), LA FIRA (EL centro de exhibiciones y Congresos de Barcelona), Poble Español, la sala de exposiciones Caixa Forum, El Palacio Nacional con las Fuentes mágicas de Montjuic, el Camp Nou…Todo a pocos minutos a pie del apartamento. También se puede visitar el Estadio Olímpico,
neighborhood_overview: Las atracciones mas cercanas al apartamento son: MNAC (Museo Nacional de arte de Cataluña), LA FIRA (EL centro de exhibiciones y Congresos de Barcelona), Poble Español, la sala de exposiciones Caixa Forum, El Palacio Nacional con las Fuentes mágicas de Montjuic, el Camp Nou…Todo a pocos minutos a pie del apartamento. También se puede visitar el Estadio Olímpico, el Palau Sant Jordi , el Castillo de Montjuic, la estación del teleférico, la Fundación Joan Miró. Y no olvidemos las preciosas playas de Barcelona, Sitges y Castelldefels (salen autobuses o trenes directos). Además el metro que tenemos justo al lado lleva a la Plaza Catalunya, Ramblas, Barrio Gótico, Parque Güell…
transit: - Para venir desde el aeropuerto puedes coger el metro hasta Torrassa y cambiar a la línea roja hasta Mercat Nou. Esta estación de metro está en la misma calle del apartamento.
house_rules: - - Las normas propias del sentido común y respeto mutuo. - No se puede hacer fiestas.  - Sólo está permitido fumar en la terraza. - Al llegar todos los huéspedes deben rellenar un formulario con sus datos que será enviado a la Generalitat de Catalunya. - Las llegadas después de las 10 pm tendrán un recargo de 30€, o si lo prefieres, puedo organizar un chófer privado para recogeros en el aeropuerto y él os llevará al apartamento y os entregará las llaves (el precio del traslado es de 25€ a la T2 o 30€ a la T1 que puedes pagar al conductor a la llegada).

name: In front of the sea, terrace close Congress center
summary: Ideal for enjoying Barcelona with friends, family or even for business! This apartment is in compliance with the law being professionally managed by our family business ES-FLATS (Aurélie & Eberhard), we check the flat before and after each stay and manage cleaning and maintenance with a professional team. We have all the oficial licences and insurances required to exercise the touristic rental, which is mandatory in Catalunya.
space: This beautiful and bright exclusif flat is located in front of the sea, 250 metres to the beach (3 minutes walking). It is right next to the congress center CCIB,  800  metres (10 minutes walking) and 500 metres to the famous shopping mall Diagonal Mar ( 7 minutes walking).  You will enjoy his terrace ! There are 4 quiet bedrooms, each one with a double bed, there are 2 complete bathrooms, a spacious dinning and living room with direct access to the terrace where you can eat outside, and a big fully equipped kitchen. The flat is located in the 1st floor with lift. We keep trying to be as much as possible “eco friendly”, so please help us to take care of the environment. The pool is opened from may til october , dates can changes depending of the season.

interaction: We offer to our guests an individual and personalized service, starting from the upstream communication, the arrival onsite and during the stay, until the departure.  We reply to all your questions in few hours and always do our best to fulfill your needs. After booking, you will receive a list of extra services such as Airport pick up, fridge stocking, activities, entrance to monuments… and you will have the possibility to book it in advance in order to enjoy the maximum of your stay. For the ones who come by car, we have agreements with most of the parkings around offering you the best prices to let your car in a safe place. We speak fluently 4 languages, English, French, German and Spanish, which is a big advantage to communicate and exchange information. We welcome our guests personally upon arrival; we give them information about the surrounding, some advices and a map of the city and the public transportation. We adapt the check-in to your arrival time when it is possible; note t
house_rules: Smoking allowed on terrace only.  As part of a residence you have to show your passport at arrival.  When you leave the flat please always check that the air condition and lights are switched off and that the doors and windows are closed. Open window means no air condition switched on ;-) Because we respect our neighbors, no parties are allowed and we expect a responsible behavior especially on arrival and departure, lift use, staircase and public areas. Just the reserved number of people is allowed to sleep in flat.

Dear travelers, 
Many years ago we moved from Austria & France to Barcelona for professional reasons. I am an architect and my partner/wife Aurélie works in tourism. 
We feel that Spain is a fantastic place, so we would like to offer you memorable stay. 
You can write to us in English, German, Spanish or French. 
Please do not hesitate to contact us, should you need any further information, we will be more than happy to assist you.
All the properties we manage comply with the law and are registered as rental properties, our flats and laundry are professionally cleaned for upmost quality, hygiene and comfort. 
We thrive to provide you with the best quality service and we will go above and beyond to make sure you enjoy your stay in this wonderful city!

Esra’s place can be a good choice for those who is looking for a lovely studio in the European side of Istanbul close to public transportation. You can access Tunel funicular, nostalgic tramway(Istiklal Avenue) and even metro line(M2).

Great location: Close to Galata tower, İstiklal avenue, the Şişhane metro stop.

Nice enough flat for the price, and the pictures are quite accurate. However, also as seen in the pictures, there’s no laptop friendly work space – even if it’s listed in the Amenities section.

We arrived to a cold flat after having some trouble finding it (the building doesn’t have a street number), and heating it up took all evening – partially because there’s a big gap under the flat’s entrance door, and the stairwell is open to the outside at all times. Which leads us to the next issue – stray cat feces and stains on the steps. It was cleaned now and then, but not nearly often enough.

The building is old and full of ‘old house noises’, from neighbors and the environment. While some of this can be charming, I would have expected other things to be in order, easy things like tightening a door bolt so that it doesn’t rattle whenever someone downstairs breathes.

All in all we’re happy enough considering how cheap the place is and its great location, but there are things we want people to know about before deciding whether to rent.
This is a very beautiful and cozy apartment in the heart of Istanbul. Ezra is a great host

neighborhood_overview: Avenida dos Aliados, also known as the "guestroom" of the city, is itself a work of art: the facades of the buildings are imposing, rich in architecture and there is story spread everywhere. Less than 1 km away you will find places such as Rua de Santa Catarina, the famous Clérigos Tower, Rua das Flores or the Lello Bookstore. Since we do not only live of culture, prepare yourself to eat a Francesinha made in a wood oven on the Cervejaria do Brasão, delicacies in the Cantinho do Avillez, cod or octopus in the Restaurant Traça or be delighted with typical Portuguese food in the Adega de São Nicolau.
notes: In order to make Porto more attractive, the municipal tourist tax came into effect. The rate of € 2.00 included in the price of stay, is for guests over the age of 13. It is charged per person and per night for a maximum of 7 nights. We have a transfer service that will leave you at the apartment! You only need to ask it (consult us for price) You can also enjoy a delicious breakfast, which can be delivered every morning in your apartment, upon request (consult us for price)
transit: You can request our transfer service whenever you need it (consult us for price) There is a vast public transportation network at your disposal.

It comes with a spacious and fully set up kitchen, so you have it all from dishwasher to stove and microwave and everything else to whip up a meal if that is your thing. neighborhood_overview: Rushcutter Bay is neighbour to one of Australia's most famous suburbs Kings Cross which is known worldwide. It has a great mix of travellers and locals and the suburb is very eclectic with a wide variety of people from all walks of life. If you like to stay where the action is stay at our place. Walking distance to the city and a great selection of restaurants/bars and nightclubs you have everything you need right at your doorstep.
transit: The apartment is located right near Kings Cross station. One stop to the City and two stops to Bondi Junction. You can also easily walk in the City Centre in around 20 minutes. And if you feel lazy, especially at night, an Uber is always a good and cost effective way to get home quickly.
access: You will have access to the whole studio. It comes with a spacious and fully set up kitchen, so you have it all from dishwasher to stove and microwave and everything else to whip up a meal if that is your thing. You will sleep on a brand new bed and all other amenities are set up so you can have a very comfortable stay with 2 people.  The bathroom has a shower and also houses the internal laundry with washing machine and dyer.  The house is stacked with all essentials for your convenience. There is also a small balcony on which it is nice to relax.
interaction: We usually leave you to enjoy your stay and give you privacy. However if you require help with anything we are always just a phone call away.
house_rules: - TERMS and CONDITIONS:  Please read the following before booking our house. We have a beautiful home we like to share with you and we have to make sure the house and our neighbours are happy with you there.  With large houses like this there are just a few extra rules we want you to be aware so we all have the best possible interaction with one another.  1. We have a strict no events policy at this house. We can NOT accommodate any type of event. No parties, no hens/bucks weekends or functions.  2. Noise complaints. Most neighbours live here permanently and so they do have the right to expect it to be quite during the hours of 10pm-8am. Any complaints from neighbours may result in immediate termination of rental and loss of all remaining monies paid including bond.  3. Any breach of house rules in general can result in eviction and loss of bond. House rules are  a. No extra people on premises. If booked for 5 people 5 people can stay even if the property accommodates more guests.  b.

reviews.comments:
Location + Cleanliness + Value

Literally, 2-3 min walk from Sheung Wan station (which is 1 station away from Hong Kong station where most people would stop via Airport Express). Also, walking distance to Central and Lan Kwai Fong. You will not find a better price for this location! 

The space is small and there is no elevator if you have a big luggage. But I think this is rather standard for most places in Hong Kong. Travel light because even hotels would be really small! 

The room looks a lot better than what is currently displayed in the pictures. It is minimalistic but chic. Basic amenities were provided i.e. wifi, towels, water boiler, soap, toilet paper, etc. 

And lastly, communication with Cristhell is smooth and she was early to meet me.

Cristhell is very friendly and helpful, the room is suitable for 2 people, small but clean,and the location is really good, near metro station and bus-stop,very convenient for going out. It will be better if providing hair dryer and slipper as well.
I will  choose this room when I go to HongKong next time.

host.host_about:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Hello all way from İstanbul, Turkey.
ı welcome anybody who wishes to enjoy the comfort of staying at a nice apartment just in the very center of İstanbul in my apartment. As a traveller, ı both had the chance experiencing  the luxury and the comfort  at the same time during my trips araound the world  and somehow ı found my self running my apartment after completing . i believe everybody would agree with me that what feels great is to pay less for housing but enjoying the city you travel by spending more on other things rather than paying high cost hotel fees. Being aware of this, ı want my guest feel the same and enjoy being İstanbul as much as they can.
ı guarantee nice and clean accommodation, low cost recommendation, anything about the city and Turkish hospitality.
We would be pleased to welcome you here. my apartment is located in the Ayasofya-Sultanahmet area and only 5 minutes walking distance to the sultanahmet area.


Best & Kind Regards.

address.street: Istanbul, Küçük Ayasofya - Sultanahmet - Fatih / Istanbul / TURKIYE, Turkey

reviews.comments: Sultan's apartment was cozy and clean. The apartment is very centrally located and pefect for a short trip to Istanbul. It is quiet and safe. Sultan has organized airport transfers for us and it worked out fine. On time and friendly. Thank you!

Very nice and cozy room with a terrace at the top floor! The rooms are exactly the ones shown in the photos and there is no disappointment. The friendly host even served us Turkish coffee and biscuits the moment we reached! Room was kept tidy everyday and we had a comfortable stay. The place is easily accessible from sultanahmet station and within walking distance from all the major attractions in sultanahmet area. Definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for an affordable  apartment that comes with quality and cleanliness!

This small place is a gem in the old historic part of Istanbul--and for a great price! It was a very clean & well-kept place, in an excellent location in the old city. There were many restaurants & stores within walking distance, and it was a quick 10-minute walk to the Blue Mosque (Sultanahmet) area. 

Ms. Ece, who lives just downstairs, is the Manager of this place, has good English and was very friendly & welcoming. We were served cool juice and cookies upon our arrival and were given a good map of the area. Ms. Ece also did a great job in arranging our late night departure for the airport by a private car.

The "apartment" was small, but adequate, with not much room for your luggage, if you are two people like we were. It has a small kitchen area and bathroom, and the roof terrace was a nice touch. This is really not a full apartment, as there was also an open living area and another "apartment" (or room?) on the same floor. But it was private and comfortable. There was also good A/C (split) and internet.

3층에 숙소가 있고 주인은 2층에 삽니다. 할머니와 엄마와 딸이 함께 운영하는 숙소여서 안전한 느낌이 들어서 좋았습니다. 생각보다는 방이 작습니다. 싱글침대 2개들어가면 딱 맞는 느낌? 냉장고와 에어컨이 있어서 좋았습니다. 그리고 주인이 지하철역으로 마중을 나와주거나 이런건 없었습니다. 요청을 했는데 안된다고 하더군요^^; 술탄아흐메트역에서 걸어서 찾아갔는데 처음에 찾아가는 것이 몹시 힘들었습니다. 이 숙소 이름이 Bright hotel인가 그런데 아무도 모릅니다. 지도 프린트 잘 해가시고요 Led travel이라는 작은 투어회사 옆에 있고요 근처에 공원이 있으니 이것을 기점으로 찾아가시면 될겁니다. 저는 좁은거랑 3층까지 올라가는 계단이 너무 좁고 가파른것 빼고는 다 괜찮았습니다^^

Even if the room is a bit small, the location is perfect to visit Istanbul, 5 minutes by foot to the historical center in a wonderful and safe part of the city. The appartment is quiet and very clean, and there is a terrace were you can stay in order to appreciate the particular atmosphere of the ancient Costantinople during the morning or in the sunset. Sultan and her family (Ece, her brother and grandma) have been perfect host, extremely kind and helpfull, very reliable and avaible to solve problems and needs. They also organized our transfert to/from the airport by a private car and have created an instant feeling of being at home. The kitchen is well equipped and the price cheaper than every other hotel near Sultan's home: strictly recommended!

I really recommend taking a taxi from the airport.  Show the driver your address and ask him how much it will cost.  It cost us 50 lira to get there.  When we left we took a taxi to the bus station and it cost us 35 lira.  Taking the tram for the first time might be a bit too much.  

The room was clean and big enough for two people.  It had a fridge and a hot plate if you choose to cook anything.  It had air conditioning which was quite nice to be able to close the window at night to block out the noises.  The building was nice as well.  We did not go on the terrace, but I'm sure it was lovely.  

The area is touristy enough that you still feel safe at night and not too secluded.  Plenty of restaurant options and little markets to buy snacks are around.  My friend and I got lost often, so I highly recommend taking photos of street names and make sure you know where you are.  The streets are confusing and sometimes there aren't street names.  

Sultan was very sweet, as well as her husband, but we mostly dealt with Ece her daughter who spoke English pretty well.  She was very sweet and very helpful with setting up a bus ticket for us, calling the taxi, etc.  A very smart young lady who has a bright future.  

I highly recommend staying here and hope maybe someday I can go back.

We had a wonderful stay with Sultan. The room was clean and in a great location of the city. Our hosts were lovely-they were incredibly communicative and kind, and were helpful in all regards. We would stay again. Thank you!
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Sultan and here daughter were great hosts as I requested last minute. Communication and arrival were smooth. She even brought us coffee and cookies! We checked out very early (3:30) and Sultan woke to send us on our way back to the US.

Wonderful! Book it, you won't regret it. Perfect room for two people with a giant wardrobe, super comfy beds and a beautiful terrace and roof access in a stellar location in Old Town area. Sultan and her daughter were so kind bringing my sister and I a welcome snack of Turkish coffee and candied almonds. They were perfect hosts and very helpful. It's not very large but it's everything you need to lay your things, sleep well and take a nice shower. Wifi runs very fast, too. So close to Blue Mosque and Hagria Sophia and the Grand Bazaar area. Perfect to explore those sights. Highly recommend! We really enjoyed our time.

Superb! Sultan and her daughter Ece are great hosts. We got a map of Istanbul and also some good tips where to go. They also organized the transfer from and to the airport for us. The room was nice, clean, ideal for two people in a great location really close to the historic center. The kitchen and bathroom are quite well equipped. We had towels,shower gel and shampoo and even slippers at the disposal. We really enjoyed our stay there. Highly recommend! Thank you for nice time.

Very welcoming hosts, Sultan and her daughter. They provided me with a map of the Sultanahmet and recommendations for places to go and things to see. The room was fantastic, the top floor of their building, lots of light, patio overlooking a schoolyard. The apartment is literally a 5 minute walk to the center of the Sultanahmet. You might need a GPS to find it initially, but after that, it's all good. It's close to numerous little eateries and stores, as well as Little Aya Sofia. The people in the neighborhood were very friendly. I got lost looking for the street and a local man kindly used his iPhone to get me there. The wifi worked great, the bathroom was very clean and the hot water came up immediately. The bed was comfy. Sultan was also very accommodating about my early arrival; I was able to check in at 8:30 am. I would certainly stay here again and recommend it to my friends.

Muy bien
Acogedor
Buen barrio
Buena gente
Limpio
Very Nice room with friendly host.

The location of the hotel is perfect, very central. When we arrived, it appeared that the person who lived in the room before us, stayed for one more night. We haven't been informed about it before and we were very unhappy about this fact. However Sultan and her husband dealt with this problem well. They did the following to make it up to us: for the night of the double booking we have been relocated to a better hotel. The day after when we came back to the hotel they gave us an  upgraded room and a bottle of wine. Hence all in all we were satisfied with how they dealt with the issue. Our apartment was very clean and functional. This place can be recommended and we will be back if we are in Istanbul.

Sultan and her daughter, Ece, were like old friends, since we had stayed here back in July 2014. Their location is ideal for visiting the historic Sultanahmet area of Istanbul. They were very welcoming & helpful all-around. Wonderful hosts!

The room is as pictured - it is small but comfy! Enough room to walk around if you're a couple and more bedspace if you're on your own. Sultan's family live in the apartment right below, so you will always get assistance should you require it. The apartment is close to all the historical sites in the old city (about 7 minutes walk to the blue mosque and Hagia Sophia). Sultan's family members are warm and welcoming and gives great suggestions on where to eat, what to do and where to go, should you ever need some help. 

I would totally recommend this place if you want a no-frills kinda place to sleep in for the night. And because it's so close by to great food joints and the historical sites, it's easy to head back to the apartment for a quick cat nap or rest before moving on to other parts of Istanbul. 

They also do daily clean up of the room, just like hotels, but you can tell them to not disturb the room should you not want the service. 

If I'm ever back in Istanbul, I'll definitely go back to this apartment. Thank you for a wonderful stay! xx
Wonderful.a warm, clean and tiny (Website hidden by Airbnb) just takes 10 minutes to blue mosque, Sophia, old palace by foot.

Yes our hostess made us feel welcome. We were greeted when we arrived around 4:30 and we had not given her a good arrival time. The room was clean and orderly and we had everything we needed. It is a quaint neighborhood with many small reasonable restaurants and shops nearby. It is about a 15 minute walk to the big tourist attractions - the Blue Mosque and the Haya Sofia.

The room is quite small but it has everything you may need. Very good location - close to Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia; there are souvenir shops nearby and some nice restaurants and little supermarkets around. The members of Sultan's family were very nice and helpful. I really appreciate their help with organizing a taxi for us at 5 a.m. to the airport. Sultan's daughter Ece Nur was helping with everything we needed. A nice place to stay in Istanbul!

Sultan is a very good host. She helped us to return our wifi device. And her daughter told us a lot of information about Istanbul at the first night. They also provided a book which is very useful. And the location is good. It's not far away from  the historical interest. And also good restaurant nearby. :)

Sultan organised transport from the airport and that worked fine.
When we arrived he came to our room and he and his daughter made us feel welcome with suggestions and a map. If you have read the other revues you will know that the room is quite small. However it is well equipped with everything you could need. It has a large window with door leading to a small balcony so it does not seem claustrophobic in any way. One evening we  took our drinks up to the roof terrace which was fascinating. The view is not beautiful but very interesting. When the call to prayer comes it is an amazing sound with so many mosques nearby.  The location of the hotel is excellent with lots going on nearby. We loved the fish restaurant area in Sultanahmet.

My experience at Sultan's place was very pleasant. We were received by Sultan's daughter Ece who was super helpful and gave us a lot of tips about the city.

Location: very well located within the Sultanahmet area, minutes away from the main landmarks.
Room: the room is super clean and comfy and has everything you may need. Only comment is that it's quite small, so you won't want to spend a lot of time in there.
Hosts: super nice. They even gave us a public transportation card that allows you to use the tram at half the price.

In summary, we had a great Istanbul experience.

Sultan and her family were wonderful hosts for our three nights in Istanbul. The view from the rooftop terrace was unforgettable, and it we will never forget having Turkish coffee and sweets, made by our host, sitting up on the roof with them and watching the sunset! The location is perfect for seeing the sights, and there are many great food options in the area. Thanks so much for being so generous and kind during the entire trip. We would love to see you again if we come back to istanbul someday!

Sultan and her family were wonderful hosts -helped us with airport transfers, gave us a map and some tips where to go and made us feel at home. Room itself is as shown and very, very clean - they even cleaned and tided for us when we were out. Location is perfect - a five minute walk from Sultanahment but far enough away to be outside of the mega tourist zone and in an authentic Turkish neighbourhood where you can dig out some great places to eat.

We had a wonderful stay at Sultan's apartment! The room is very cozy and clean. Excellent location with access to the Blue Mosque within 10-min walking and tons of restaurants & shops nearby. Sultan and her families were very friendly. Her brother welcomed us in and gave us lots of good travel advice. Our three-day itinerary was pretty much based on the route he suggested. We also had wonderful chats with Sultan's daughter at nights. Btw the view from the roof top is absolutely AMAZING!!! You have to see it to believe it! I highly recommend Sultan's place!

Hosts were very friendly and welcoming. They showed us a map of the area to help us get our bearings. They also helped to organize taxis and make dinner reservations for us. Neighbour is centrally located to all the main attractions. Nice room for 2 people with a good shower.

Ece was an excellent host. Right from the moment we had made the booking, Ece reached out to help us organise our arrival as well as proposing some options for getting to the apartment from the airport. We arrived quite late and Ece was nonetheless there to offer a warm welcome, get us settled. Throughout our stay, we received tips and recommendations about what to see and where to eat. The location is excellent, just a short walk from the Blue Mosque and other attractions. The apartment was super clean and comfortable and on a calm street considering the central location. Towels, sheets and even a travel guide were provided! Great value accommodation and very friendly hosts.

We found this apartment to be very clean and comfortable, and the owners were very professional about everything, providing a book about Istanbul and a map. The room had means for cooking, good clean shower, cosy, etc.. It's in a great location, one way going up to the Blue mosque, the other going into some interesting local streets. There are some decent looking bars and restaurants within a minutes walk. The tram line is 5-10mins walk away (near Blue Mosque), which makes everything fairly accessible. We enjoyed walking the mile or so to the ferry and crossing over to the asian side for food and a walk about. The family owners are friendly and helpful. We had a nice stay in Istanbul.
Bedirhan is a great host, I spent good days in his place

Acceuil très professionnel et cordial par Ece, cependant elle ne cherche pas à échanger davantage, et accueil très sympatique par son frère qui nous a donné quelques bons plans pour nos visites. 
l'appartement est petit mais confortable et équipé.
il ets situé dans une rue vers la mosque petite STe Sophie, à minutes de la mosquée bleue. Le quartier est toujours bien animé et les gens y sont très sympatiques.
Il nous a paru surprenant pour un Airbnb que quelqu'un rentre dans notre chambre pendant notre absence. 
Bon rapport qualité prix, dommage que l'accueil d'Ece manque de spontanéité et de chaleur.

First of all, I am going to say that I am so glad that I found this little gem of a place on AirBnB. Right from the first moment, Sultan's daughter Ece took great care of us, bringing us a map and a guide to Istanbul. She went over our itinerary with us and would chat with us almost daily asking us about our day and giving us advice. She was even available on (Hidden by Airbnb) if we had doubts about prices at Grand Bazaar and such!
The room is beautiful! It is very stylishly decorated and very cozy. The room had counterspace, provision to make tea or coffee and even an electric stove. Like most other hotel rooms in the area, it has less square footage but it is not a problem if you are spending the day sightseeing anyways. The room has a balcony as well and at no point we felt that we were cramped. The bathroom was cleaned daily and served its purpose. Just outside the room is a lobby and you can see the picture of that with a spiral staircase. They keep the fridge filled with bottled water that you can take anytime. Ece gave us a tour of the building as well later to show us their backyard and cute fruit trees. It was overall a very clean, cozy space and we thoroughly enjoyed staying at Bright Apartments.
The biggest selling point of this place is the location! It is a 10 min walk to Sultanahmet square and the places of historical importance. The tram station is also right there near the Blue mosque and made traveling very easy. Ece had explained to us about the tram system and all the trains available to places of importance. There are also restaurants, and Arasta Bazaar and some decent bars close by if you want to dine somewhere close by to the hotel after a long day of sightseeing. There are shared shuttles also available very close by to and from airports if you dont want a private transfer. Very convenient.
Overall, it was a great experience staying here and we thank you for making our visit so memorable!

Sultan's delightful daughter, Ece, speaks fluent English and was most welcoming. She spent a few minutes giving us an orientation to the area and explained things within the apartment.  Sultan, her daughter and mother treated us to Turkish tea and cake two of the nights we were there, on their rooftop terrace.

A anfitriã e sua filha foram extremamente amáveis e atenciosas. Mantiveram o apartamento sempre limpo, trocando diariamente as toalhas. A única ressalva é quanto à área do apartamento que é menor do que parece ser no anúncio.
O bairro é bem localizado no lugar mais turístico de Istanbul, a poucas quadras da praça principal da cidade.
Nice place and amazing experience
Sultan was a great host very welcoming. I stayed for 10 nights. Located in a very peaceful area ,very quiet and very safe. The room was very clean and had everything I needed.

Adequate place in a great location. Sultan and Ece were excellent hosts. The room was cleaned daily and had various appliances for you to use. The balcony overlooking the school yard was a nice addition to the room. We had a great stay at Sultan's place and would recommend it to anyone who wants to explore beautiful Istanbul.

My mate and i had a great stay with Sultan, Ece and their family.
We arrived just past midday, and was greeted by Sultan and her son, who was able to provide us with a map and explain things to do in Istanbul. We met Ece later that night after she finished school.
The room was as described, but what really makes this AirBNB great is the people. Sultan doesn't speak much English, but is always friendly, smiling and helpful. Ece speaks great English, and was extremely generous and chatty. Although still in high school, i can already see that Ece has a bright future in the travel industry, or as an English school teacher - as long as she puts her mind to it. (She was teaching me Turkish while i was helping trying to explain high school maths to her)
Thanks to Sultan, Ece and their family for the wonderful stay. Will definitely be back next time I'm in Istanbul!
Great location and clean.

Sultana et sa famille ont été accueillants, et disponibles en cas de questions. La chambre est propre et bien équipée.
Attention cependant au plan (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps qui n'indique pas le bon endroit: nous avons mis du temps à trouver la chambre!

The apartment that we received was not the one that we had reserved online, but it was very similar. The place has a very good location close to Sultanahmet and to the tram line that brings over to the Beyoglu (Kabatac). 
The apartment was cleaned every day so it was like a hotel. Sultan and her family was very kind, they did everything to make our stay comfortable. This place is recommended.

The room look exactly as the pictures shown. 10mins walk to main attractions like the Hagia Sophia, Blue mosque and etc. Ece and her family are very welcoming and friendly. Communication was easy through (Hidden by Airbnb) .

Merci pour tout! l'accueil, le quartier, les réponses aux questions, l'arrangement... tout était super.
Merci à Ece, la fille de Sultan, qui a pu me rendre un super service et m'indiquer ce qu'il y avait de mieux à faire à Istanbul. 
Je recommande!

I had the pleasure of staying at Sultan's place for two weeks. I am a girl travelling alone and I could say this place is pretty safe. The room is super clean, and very well equipped. There are close supermarkets and restaurants so you can find anything you need. The room is a bit smaller than it seems in the picture, so if you are two people it might be a little snug, but if you are alone it is perfectly fine. The hosts are super friendly, communicative, and available. I definitely recommend this place and would stay there again if I visit in the future.

Отличное место для проживания для не требовательного туриста. В "квартире" есть все что требуется для проживания. Посуда, микроволновка, чайник. Чистое постельное белье. Удобная терраса на крыше. Очень доброжелательные хозяева. WI-FI стабильный, были проблемы только в один из 6 дней. Фото туалета не соответствует действительности. Там нет душевой кабины.
Un appartement vraiment très bien situé dans la ville ! Nous avons été très bien accueillis avec des conseils de lieux à visiter. Je vous le recommande !

The place we stayed at was a snug double room that was close to Sultanahmet and Ayasofya. The neighborhood was safe and offered quality food at good prices. Everything you need is in the room: cooking amenities, TV, fridge. The hosts were very welcoming and answered all of our questions. Very good customer service.

We had a pleasant stay! The apartment is very central, we walked everywhere and several main attractions are within 5-10 minutes. The rooftop is perfect for breakfast. The shower was different from the one pictured but it was not an issue.
The room was very clean. Not large but it suited us well and had all we needed! We got good service with the check-in, good tips for experiencing the neighborhood, and very responsive communication!
La ubicaçión es muy buena para recorrer los puntos principales del centro historico de Istanbul. Es un barrio tranquilo y pintoresco. Ece siempre esta atenta y dispuesta ayudar en todo. Un 10.

Apartments are in the Old City. Way to the Blue mosque takes no more than 10 minutes. Excellent arrangement! Apartments are small, but there are everything that it is necessary for you here. Everything is serviceable and clean. Owners clean the apt every day. The hostess is very benevolent, always in touch and helps with a case of emergence of questions. Before New Year we got a compliment from the hostess - a bottle of wine and fruits. We have been pleasantly surprised! Wifi worked well. From minuses - the subway and the tram is far, it is necessary to go to them on stone blocks on hills. It is inconvenient with freight in hands.

Connection is well, location is great, around 5-7 minutes to Blue Mosque. There is all what you need for staying. on the roof there is a small terrace where you can have breakfast or dinner, drink coffee, surfing a Internet (wi-fi is stable).

This is such a fantastic little apartment. It is small but was enough space for my friend and I. The room has a kitchenette which was very handy for quick, simple meals. But the terrace! That terrace is amazing and I miss it already. The apt is located in a great part of town, ten minutes to the main sights and restaurants. Sultan is very hospitable and kind. I highly recommend this flat if you're looking for a place in Instabul

We spent a great time in Istanbul. The apartment is well located, though streets around are very steep. Edge is a great host, and arranged transportation from and to airport. The place is really small and we could not find a place for our suitcases. (Had to put them under the table) The main problem for us was the bathroom. It is quite different from the one on the  picture. It is too small and has no curtain, so when you take a shower everything gets wet. On the other hand, It has a tiny balcony, where we could take the two chairs and enjoy a beautiful view. Nice terrace to have a drink (a bit difficult to get there).  Lots of shops and restaurants nearby.

It`s a pretty clean room with good location. The room is quite small but has its own balcony. 
Sultan and all her family are very responsive and friendly people ready to help you in any case.
The minus is not strong wi-fi quality.

Спасибо большое за гостепреимство. проживание в этом апарт-отеле понравилось. номер на 1-2 человек подходит. ванная комната не соответствует фото (в других отзывах это есть: нет душевой кабины). но во многих квартирах турции ванные комнаты именно такие. мне было вполне комфортно, т.к. сталкиваюсь с этим не первый раз. Султанахмет в 10 минутах ходьбы. требавательным туристам нужны пятизвездочные отели. аппарт-отели такого типа для нетребовательного туриста. мне все понравилось. чувствовала себя с сыном как дома. следующая поездка - именно сюда. Sultan, Ece - большой привет вам из России.;)
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: La Joie appartement
summary: Mon appartement est disponible ( du 23 au 26 Décembre )  le reste c'est un endroit très propre est simple.  Les arrêts des bus sont toute proche à max 7min a pied.  L'épicerie Métro à 5min, Maxi et SAQ à 10min à pied.  L'appartement se trouve dans un quartier très tranquille et respectueux.  La 45 Sud vous amène directement en ville et il ya deux station de metro pas loin.
description: Mon appartement est disponible ( du 23 au 26 Décembre )  le reste c'est un endroit très propre est simple.  Les arrêts des bus sont toute proche à max 7min a pied.  L'épicerie Métro à 5min, Maxi et SAQ à 10min à pied.  L'appartement se trouve dans un quartier très tranquille et respectueux. house_rules: - Pas de bruit après 23h - Vous pouvez faire la fête mais sans beaucoup des bruits.

host.host_about: Je suis une personne agréable qui n'aime pas les problèmes.  J'adore la cuisine et la musique.

name: Sleek, luxurious, in Copacabana
summary: Beautiful apt for rent in the heart of Copacabana.
space: Beautiful apt for rent in the heart of Copacabana. After many visits to this beautiful city I found that rental apts are often overpriced and poorly maintained, so I built this 42 sq meter loft apt from the ground up to be the perfect holiday retreat. Located 100 meters from the beach in a festive neighborhood near the Copacabana Palace hotel, close to metro, theatre, gym, great restaurants, and a friendly street scene. The apt is on the 7th floor. The bldg has a 24 hour door man, security cameras, AC, TV, acoustic windows, ceiling fan, cable and internet, comfortable high quality queen size bed, and ample storage for clothes and luggage. Built in the studio/ loft style with large open room and fully equipped american style kitchen. Sleek, modern style with Brazilian antiques, marble, and mirrors.  It is easy to walk to the Sugarloaf at one end of Copacabana beach or the scenic fort at the other. Nearby is an excellent french bakery if you prefer to make coffee at home and enjoy breakf
