neighborhood_overview: Legendary, historic, Copacabana! Several local street markets for fresh seafood and produce on alternating days. Nearby parks for soaking up the local color. Theatre across the street with live concerts. Numerous excellent restaurants in walking distance from the apt.  I have a restaurant guide to share with my favorites.
notes: Feve minutes from the copacabana beach!
transit: Bus stop outside Metro 1 block away Taxis always available Street parking in Copacabana
access: Entire apt access.
interaction: Host or manager is always available for help or advice.
house_rules: House rules are simple.  Please turn off the AC when you are not in the apt. Enjoy.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I am an international chef and caterer. 
I have been around the world nine times. Meeting people and experiencing new cultures is my passion.

Rio is one of my favorite cities and so I chose it for my holiday home. The spectacular setting, the people, the music, and the food make it one of the worlds great destinations. Whenever I choose a place stay, my first consideration is the location. I like to be in the center of the most interesting part of town.

I believe in offering value for money with no surprises. I think you will enjoy your stay in this beautiful apt.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
causey studio appartement in a good location in Copacabana. just over a bus stop ,one block away from the beach and pretty close to metro.
the airconditioner was a life saver in the hot summer of Rio. there is plenty of little restaurants and shops in the neighbourhood.

The ultimate in convenience. Everything you need in a copacabana base... High quality firm queen size bed. A great  wifi connection. Not to mention A great location  Everything you need is steps away... The beach, Busses, the metro, supermarkets, restaurants --including an excellent per kilo restaurant  right next door. Dennis was helpful, honest and a pleasure to deal with. He provided great restaurant and bar suggestions.

Being (Website hidden by Airbnb) a noisy busy street... Part of the convenience... Im a light sleeper and was woken up very early by traffic noise. My partner did not have trouble sleeping through it.

In all, a perfect place to be based...  24 hour doorman so we felt very safe.

Excellent apartment! First of all it would be desirable to note a smart site, 3 minutes on foot to Copakabana beach, in his best area. All conveniences are, but the Internet sometimes vanishes. And as a whole everything is good! Pure entrance friendly neighbors and protection. Nearby there are a lot of small shops where it is possible to buy everything that is necessary initially, changes, travel agencies, small restaurants and cafe. At distance of one quarter a big supermarket.
Remained are very happy with rest!!! Thanks a lot!!!

Here is the short version:  

I would gladly return to stay in Dennis' apartment.

Here's the slightly longer version:

Dennis and his property manager Will do a great job welcoming guests.  Moreover they were very responsive whenever I had a question or an issue.  The apartment is furnished with everything I needed and a whole lot more.  The neighborhood is lively, which in my opinion makes it a safe place - I never had any problems walking around at all hours of the night.  The location is outstanding, with metro access a few blocks away and bus/van access to routes that will get you all over Rio no more than a block away.

Highly recommended, and like I said, I'd happily stay here again.

Perfect place for us to crash during our stay in Rio de Janeiro. Excellent location, 24 hour access, and everything we needed close by.  You could walk or take transit anywhere, but we rented a car to visit friends and we even found relatively cheap or even free overnight parking nearby.  In Rio that's in short supply!
A couple of minor maintenance problems were taken care of promptly by property manager while we were out, so no hardship there. It's right on a major street so you wake to Rio traffic waking up, but that was part of the charm for us and a push to go out & get our morning coffee.
Seriously, my only real complaint is that there wasn't more dresser space for clothes!  We would certainly want to re-book when we come back.  Thanks to Dennis & Will, great place.

The apartment was very nice and in a good, central location. Taxi  pick up zone across street and a metro station a couple of blocks away. Beach a block away and restaurants and bars of all price levels in close proximity. Dennis was a very solicitous host and emailed a couple of times during my stay to make sure everything was okay.

Having stayed in Copa before I was a little concerned about the security situation but I neednt have been. The difference between now and 2 years ago is like night and day.  I never once felt uncomfortable and can honestly say I felt safer in the busy, bustling neighborhood around this apartment than I do back home in Las Vegas. 

I would not hesitate to recommend the place to friends or family members. If you are looking for a more "authentic" travel experience in Rio then skip the overpriced hotels and rent an apartment like this one.

One quibble:  The coffee maker is on its last legs. I like to have a big pot of Brazilian coffee in the morning and it never let me down  but its getting close to retirement age.

In short, I fully recommend this apartment.

Thank you  Dennis. Perfect location, safe building, and friendly doormen. The apart was clean, and Will (the apart manager) was there on my arrival.
Please, if you think of coming to Rio, don't hesitate! Rent Dennis apart, and forget everything you heard about Rio! The city has been cleaned down, i haven't felt unsafe one's. The beaches are beautiful, and the Cariocas are very friendly.
I will come back.

Very conveniently located 1 block from Copa Beach. Came in very handy on New Year's Eve with 2.5mil people going to the beach. Thanks to Dennis (owner) and Will (host) for all the info and help. 

The apartment caters for all you needs if you like to be on the go and enjoy Rio. It is interestingly interiorly decorated. The fan and aircon was a life saver in the Rio heat. Wifi was a very welcome tool to find your way in Rio.

Perfect apartment! Just came back after 2 incredible weeks in Rio. Impossible to imagine place  which is located better. There’s all you need.
Many restaurants  and juice bars,  large beach (just 3 min to walk), bus station ( 1 min), metro (5 min), banks, changes, shops, supermarkets…..
The area is very safe.
It’s very convenient like at home. 
We spent a lot of happily moments there.

Thank you a lot to Dennis & Will, perfect place!!!
Highly recommended.

February 2013.

Appartamento comodo e veramente ben servito, intorno c'è tutto. Zona molto sicura e tranquilla 
Proprietario di casa fantastico e molto disponibile

Dennis' Studio was very well kept/Stylish and very comfortable, in a great location, walk to beach and many places all within walking distance. Dennis went above and beyond and helped us with suggestions while visiting and lists of restuarants to try and good to know info that really helped! Best option in Copacabana!

The stay at the apartment was as advertised. The room is excellently located with food and groceries close by. The manager was prompt with our requests and made us very comfortable. The security guard at the main entrance provided us added comfort. I would recommend the apartment to anyone who is visiting Rio de Janeiro and want an inexpensive stay close to Copacabana beach. Muito Obrigado

Dennis was the perfect host.  The apartment looks just as pictured and has everything needed for a comfortable stay. Location is great too; 1 block from Copacabana beach, taxis always available right out front, currency exchange next door and everything else you might need within a block or two. Both Dennis and the apt manager Wil were very responsive and accommodating.  Dennis even provided me with a list of fabulous restaurants to try! I would not hesitate to stay here again next time visit Rio! Thanks Dennis!

Apt. is excellent.  My only disappointment was that there wash't a microwave or toaster available.  These items are important to American or European travelers.  apt was as described. Location is excellent and convenient to Metro and buses.  Local manager was very accommodating and friendly.  I would rent again.

Even before our arrival Dennis was very helpful and supportive, always reachable and ready to answer to any questions. Once in Rio his apartment manager Will took over this part of being a lovely help with anything really. Apart from this great interpersonal experience throughout our stay, the apartment is just as wonderful as pictured. Only a few minutes walk from the beach, close to a 24h supermarket, a bus stop taking you to almost all touristic sights as well as a bunch of great restaurants and even a money exchange next door.
If you have any doubts or it's your first time in rio or with airbnb I can only recommend you book with Dennis since he is very reliable and so is Will. 
Muito obrigada por tudo e até a próxima!!

Dennis (and his manager Will) was very friendly and easy to communicate with. Dennis was there to welcome us and he's so far I know the most sympathic host ever!!!
The flat was better than on the pictures, spacier, cozier, and actually cheaper than the others ones I checked then. Very well located, and near to any conveniences, you really should rent this flat eyes closed!!

We had a fantastic experience staying in Dennis's apartment. From the beginning of the reservation process to the end of our stay, Dennis was helpful and accommodating  . The apartment location was amazing. It is modern, clean and well kept. We felt very safe. We would definitely stay here again when we return to Rio!
Tutto perfetto. Appartamento centralissimo e molto carino per una vacanza a Rio.

The apartment was good. Conveniently located, as stated in many other reviews. The best part was Dennis. He was very helpful and provided great recommendations. By far the best host I've come across on airbnb.

As stated in an earlier review the apartment is actually bigger than it appears in the pictures.  I didn't get a chance to meet Dennis but he was available by phone and internet and provided very helpful recommendations.  

The property manager Will was also a wonderful resource.  Please if you have any questions about the area or things to do use him as a resource.  He also was very flexible with my arrival and departure times due to my flight schedules. 

There were restaurants, bars, stores for necessities, public transport nearby and the beach was 1 block away down a well lit street.  I felt very comfortable and safe but also like I was amongst the people.  

I had a great time staying here, would recommend the aparment and would stay here again.

Dennis apartment has everything you need. Location is perfect since it is one block from Copacabana beach and its a safe during day and night. Also you have many supermarkets, shops and restaurants everywhere. There is a taxi rank in front of the apartment so it is great if you want to go out at night (e.g Lapa is 6 minutes by taxi). Wifi and air air conditioner goes perfect! Highly recommended Dennis place!
thank you very much for the best time of my life!

What a lively place! I am really glad I have chosen that flat, it’s never boring at Copacabana and whatever you need, you get it all within 5 minutes walk. The place is safe, we have been here 1 month. 
I can tell Dennis is a caterer because the kitchen has everything you might need to cook. The bed is comfy and big, thanks Dennis!
Also good shower, nice place and I would recommend this to everyone.
Dennis is really nice, whenever I was asking him something he always was helpful and kind, I really appreciate that!
Tx for hosting us in the most amazing city I have ever seen, tx for the absolute outstanding experience in Rio.
That’s maybe the moment just to tell everybody out there to join the Airbnb activities, we did not all of them but many, amazing experience!
Tx Dennis, tx Airbnb!

Daniela and Shilan
Great location and just very very comfortable

Sai Ying Pun and Mid Levels is an area in the northwestern part of Hong Kong Island, part of Central and Western District. Full of life and new restaurants ( High Street
neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun and Mid Levels is an area in the northwestern part of Hong Kong Island, part of Central and Western District. Full of life and new restaurants ( High Street 3 min walk) since the opening of the second escalator.   Called the "new soho" as more and more expats are moving to this area to modern and renovated flats/ rooftops in old walkup buildings.
transit: WALK A series of escalators can take pedestrians from First to Third Street via the markets. Making the walk to central and soho via hollywood rd in only 10 min. (Free = Healthy) MTR Only 3 min walk away from the new Sai Ying Pun MTR station EXIT C and 2 stops away form Central on the Island line. TAXI Taxis frequent at Boham road , First, Second and Third Streets. It takes only 5 min to reach Central. (30 HKD = 3 Euros) TRAM Trams run along Des Voeux Road West, taking passengers to the east or west of Hong Kong Island. (2,4 HKD = 24 cents Euro) BUS Many bus routes run every 5 min along Des Voeux Road and Queens Road West. (around 9 HKD = 90 cents Euro) Also Is Well conected to Kowloon side as The Western Harbour Tunnel goes from Sai Ying Pun under Victoria Harbour to West Kowloon and is a popular route for cars, trucks and buses.

host.host_about:
Love Hawaii Villas is a full-service boutique vacation rental marketing and management firm, specializing in exclusive luxury oceanfront condos in the Ko Olina Resort on West Oahu. As an authorized Rental Agency (RA) at the Beach Villas at Ko Olina, on Lagoon 2, the Team at Love Hawaii Villas is committed to delivering the best available vacation rental accommodations experience available. 

Featuring 2BD and 3BD luxury oceanfront condos as well as private, gated oceanfront homes a short drive from the Resort, Love Hawaii Villas is your island connection for beautifully furnished and decorated Hawaii oceanfront resort condos and golf course frontage homes. 

The leadership Team at Love Hawaii Villas has more than three decades of combined experience with Hawaii vacation rental management and looks forward to helping you experience "A better way to stay!"

reviews.comments:
The best AirBnB experience we've had (out of 9). It's a beautiful,  safe, and private locale with top amenities. 
- Beautiful: overlooking a semi-private lagoon onto the gorgeous Pacific Ocean, where we sipped wine for every sunset
- Safe: the facilities are only accessible with an encoded plastic "key". This gets you inside the buildings, use of the elevator, into your room, onto the grounds. You even have to use it to get OUT of the private grounds and onto the lagoon (a feature, not a bug).
- Private: it's away from the hustle N bustle of Honolulu, but that's just a 45 min drive away on the H1. The grounds are manicured daily,  lots of trees and Hawaiian flora. The Koi ponds are a big hit with the keiki (children). 
- Amenities: Our lanai had 4 beach chairs, 2 bogey boards, a mid-sized ice cooler, and children's beach toys. You can open up the 'wall' to the lanai and make it feel like its part of the room. The kitchen was fully loaded with what we needed to cook, including a cork screw. I liked that the master suite had its own thermostat for the air conditioner. Nice master bathroom too. The WIFI worked. If I had questions regarding the unit, I got answers within hours, not days. There are restaurants and stores about a 7 min walk away, including Roy's, an upper-scale place to get good island cuisine.

name: Relax on the Terrace of a Darlinghurst Home
summary: Soak up the sunshine on a lounger at this inner-city house, tucked away in a quiet street, yet close to the action. Recharge in this bright, modern, air-conditioned space, which opens onto a secluded outdoor terrace area.
space: Welcome to Sydney! This quirky terrace house has been recently renovated from its old corner shop origins to be a bright and airy open-plan designer residence with quality inclusions throughout.  The house has two bedrooms and two bathrooms (one of each occupied by the owner). The rented bedroom has a mirrored built-in wardrobe, and private access to the outdoor raised terrace area - perfect for catching a bit of Sydney sun. The room also comes with a double bed, an LCD TV with Entertainment channels from Foxtel/cable TV, and a radio/alarm clock that also acts as an iPod/iPhone charger and music player.  It is also fully air-conditioned (as is the remainder of the house). Guests have their own bathroom (on the ground floor), and use of the new kitchen (gas cook top and electric oven, dishwasher and fridge) along with use of the front-loading washing machine. The lounge and main TV area is also available for use by guests. The house is situated in a quite street in Darlinghurst.  The gr
description: Soak up the sunshine on a lounger at this inner-city house, tucked away in a quiet street, yet close to the action. Recharge in this bright, modern, air-conditioned space, which opens onto a secluded outdoor terrace area.
neighborhood_overview: Victoria Street, Stanley Street, and Crown Street are culturally rich destinations. These high street areas are connected by a network of laneways and street corners replete with small bars, cafes, and boutique indie retail.
transit: Getting around the inner areas of Sydney is easy from this location. Most attractions are within walking distance (within 20-30 mins walk). However, if you're not so keen on walking, there are numerous bus routes that service the area (from Flinders Street and Oxford Street). The Sydney public transport network can most easily be accessed with use of an Opal Card - which I can supply if needed.
access: Guests have full access to the living area and kitchen. They have their own bathroom (on different level to the bedroom), bedroom, and direct access to the outdoor terrace area.
interaction: I'm happy to socialise with guests, but just as happy to give them their own space if that is what they're after. I generally work weekdays, but I'm just a phone call away if needed.
house_rules: No smoking inside. As I work full time I can only guarantee a late check-in (after 6pm) on weekdays. However, there is some flexibility with this, depending on your arrival day and time (any time on weekends is fine for example, and I can sometimes get away during lunch breaks if my workload permits).  So if you have your travel details and would like an earlier check-in..... please ask and it may be possible.

host.host_about: Inner city Sydney guy, loves to travel, but has mostly only explored Europe and the US so far! Favourite destinations are Berlin, New York, Chicago, and Barcelona. Looking forward to exploring more, and hosting visitors from all around the globe!

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay! Great location, modern and clean appartment and very helpfull and nice host. We can definently recommend. Note that the bed is snug for two large adults, but we didn't mind :o)

David's place was really beautiful and (Darlinghurst) is the perfect location from which to explore the rest of Sydney.  The bedroom has plenty of space to 'unpack' and the adjacent balcony is great when you want stop moving for a bit.  The shared kitchen and living space are very comfortable.

DJ was a delightful host.  His place is amazing.  It's clean, modern and much better than staying in a hotel.  Its tastefully appointed and has all the conveniences that a traveler could want, at an affordable price.  His place is ideally located on the boundaries of Surrey Hills and Darlinghurst with a bus stop just steps away.  You have access to a sunny balcony from your bedroom and the bed is quite comfortable.  DJ will give you your privacy if you want but is also quite friendly and willing to help with suggestions for meals or things to do.  I will definitely stay here again if I have the chance to return to Sydney.

David's place is perfectly located if you want to enjoy the city. It's also very tastefully designed. We found everything we needed. 
The place was clean and quiet. 
David is a true gentleman. We had some scheduling problems and had no place to stay, he took us in with really little notice and saved our trip.

David is a great host. Wish i had more time to get to know him :) Apartment was spec and just as shown in the pictures. GREAT location. David also was very helpful and always attended to anything i asked for. Overall a great experience.
A fine host in a comfortable and stylish house in quiet location yet close to transport, food and nightlife.
I had a great stay with David, he was very friendly and the house was in perfect shape!

Had a great stay at David's modern styled and very clean house. He was very flexible in accommodating my very early arrival. The location can't be beat, it's very central and I was able to walk to the meetings I had in Sydney. There is a lot to do nearby but the apartment is a block away from the noise: you'll sleep well! I wish I could have stayed longer!
My visit to Sydney was pretty hectic, so I only saw David once during my stay, at the start of the trip - but he was friendly and helpful, and his house is lovely and in a great location.

I spent beautiful and very relaxing 2 weeks in  Davids house. The room with the fantastic terrace ensuite was great. The house had a very positive atmosphereand I felt welcomed..David is a very decent, polite and nice host.
The house is situated in a  small and quiet street which is situated in the heart of beautiful Darlinghurst. A lot of restaurants, cafés and shops around and parks in food distance. I can recommend Davids place 100%!
Thanks one more time David!

The house is in a great location only a couple of hundred metres from Tailor Square. Its walking distance from all the entertainment and dining options on Oxford Street, Victoria Road and Kings Cross.

The bedroom was nice but a little small for a male-male couple with luggage. The bathroom is nice but it's a little awkward walking up and down the stairs to get between the bedroom and the bathroom. If you're not worried about privacy this is just an inconvenience. The bathroom's location next to the living area is also a little embarrassing when you have those noisy moments.

Great host! I really enjoyed my stay with David, he made me feel very welcome, and the room was perfect. The private bathroom is just down the stairs, and there is a door straight onto the terrace from the bedroom, which was lovely in the mornings to get a little sun! Very comfortable bed (better than the one I have at home), and plenty of storage space.

Everything worked perfectly, the wifi was fast, and David left me space in the kitchen should I wish to buy food. He also very kindly let me use his washing machine when my trip was extended, and even hung it out to dry when he got home before me! Very kind and accommodating host, highly recommended for your stay in Sydney!

I'd also recommend "the wholemeal cafe" just round the corner
As before... Great host!
Other folks have said it all--- David is a great host, his house was lovely, and it made my stay in the city quite enjoyable.  I will definitely stay with him again if I ever make it back to Sydney!
Way better than staying in a hotel. Dj's apartment is clean, modern and welcoming not to mention its central location, Loved my stay

Great location. Could travel to Townhall easily by bus and the bus stop is just 5 minutes walk away. The area is generally safe because its located near the main junction and I feel safe walking back home because it's not one of those dark streets that you can see elsewhere. Lots of food located nearby . House is really clean and very comfortable.

Our stay (my boyfriend and I & a friend and I) with DJ was very conveniant. Our plane got in late which was no drama at all. The place is very conveniantly located in walking distance to all the good spots in Paddington, Surry Hills and Darlinghurst and about 15 - 20 minutes walk into the CBD. Everything was lovely and clean and the house was easy to get in and out of. DJ even provided a succinct list of dinner spots to try. 

I would definately reccomend staying here to all travellers. Thanks!

I very much appreciate staying at David's place. He is a wonderful host. Any question I had, if he didn't know he'd look it up on his i-pad...even, 'what time does the sun rise?' His place is clean and attractive. I loved the little balcony off of my room. I ate most of my meals out there. I hgihly recommend his place. Thank you, David.

Great place! Stylishly designed. You got foxtel in your room which is amazing for quiet nights in during the week. And you also have your own bathroom. The place is on a quiet street but only 1 min walk to Oxford st and Bourke st where everything is!

I loved staying at David's house as it was the perfect place for my trip when I went to Sydney for a conference.

1- The location is very convenient (close to business district but in a quiet and nice area). There were also many food places around. I found a good grocery store and a fine pizza restaurant near the house, which was one David's recommendations. 

2- David was very helpful and welcoming. He was kind enough to let me check in early and check out late on Sundays. 

3- The house is very clean and modern. The bedroom is comfortable and it has a nice terrace. What I loved the most about my experience is that although I had tons of work to do during my stay, David's place allowed me to do so with tranquility and convenience.

I highly recommend this place to people who needs tranquility, comfort and convenience. I will definitely recommend it to my friends, and will check it out again when I will return to Australia.
Had a great stay with DJ even though it was only for a couple of nights, he was a very welcoming and considerate host. Definitely would recommend a stay there.

We had a fantastic stay with the mysterious DJ Walker, who is always impeccable with his sense of timing!  He is well organized, well groomed, clean and tidy with a readiness to be available over the mobile.  The place is clean, minimalist yet spacious with a splendid layout of equipment tucked away in mystical drawers and doors in neat little compartments. The design of the place is quite enchanting, and we are tempted to ask if the man himself had designed the place?!

Lovely neighborhood that is easy with get around, strong WiFi signal, with nice brekkie eateries and convenient access to public transport.  Suitably enchanted for our 8 days stay here, and proud to say that we love to call it our home, albeit a short while.  Will definitely ask to come back again if we were to visit Sydney!  GOD bless!

David's house is really nice and the location is awesome. I strolled along the area and let myself getting lost in the city and exposed to so many cool areas in Sydney like the famous Oxford St, Hyde Park,  Surry Hills, Kings Cross and Victoria St.  
The bed in my bedroom is so comfy, I had a hard time every morning to leave the bed.  It is just too comfortable.  

I just love how David prepares all the helpful Sydney Guide and various board games he has in the guest room. 

Definitely a place to stay if you're after a nice and cozy place in Sydney.

I stayed for two nights at David's place with my boyfriend. We were very busy with work but had a great stay! 
The apartment was very clean, new and nice. The location worked out really well too for us. Wish we would have had more time - e.g. to relax outside on the balcony.
David was uncomplicated, and seemed to be a really great guy.
I would definitely stay at David's place again.

I stayed at David's place for 11 nights and loved it. It was exactly like on the pictures and very clean. unfortunately I wasn't around a lot, but when we had a chance to chat, David was a helpfull and very pleasant host.
The place is only a few minutes away from the bus stops at Oxford Street and shops and restaurants/cafés are practically around the corner, still the area was very nice and quiet. I certainly would stay at David's place again.
Great location, very safe, nice house. I recommend to stay with Dj who is a friendly and unomplicated host. Thanks Dj!

The stay with David was very comfortable, safe and relaxing. A great side street off the main road, but without any noise...even on your private balcony!
David was a good host in making sure you settle into the area alright. He provided excellent choices for restaurants and bars, maps and activity booklets throughout Sydney.
David was great to stay with, for the short time I was there, but was good a chat after I'd been winding through the city all day.
I recommend staying the David, for the quality house and room, good company and location (an easy walk to Hyde Park).
Thanks David.

Nous avons passe presque 3 semaines chez David. Notre chambre était petite mais très confortable, très pratique en rangements, et surtout elle donnait sur une terrasse adorable, ce que nous avons beaucoup apprécié, ainsi que la salle. Bain indépendante. Davis est un hôte charmant, discret, aidant. Nous avons adore ce séjour chez lui.
Place is as shown. AC is very good, perfect after running around Sydney all day. Clean and safe building.

I stayed at David's place for 4 nights while I was in Sydney for a friend's birthday. His place was exactly as it looks in the photos.  It was secure, well appointed, spotlessly clean and despite it's proximity to Darlinghurst's nightlife, it was very quiet.

The room had everything you could want, a comfy bed, plenty of storage, aircon, TV with Foxtel and direct access to a sunny deck.  The private bathroom was also modern and  luxurious.

David was a thoughtful and considerate host and made me feel completely welcome.  The booklet he had compiled of the many great cafes, bars and restaurants in the area was also very useful, and I sampled many of them. 

The location is superb, with so much within walking distance, buses practically on the doorstep and trains just a short stroll away. 

I would definitely stay at David's place if I was in Sydney again and highly recommend it to anyone heading to Sydney. 

This was my first experience with AirBnB.  I don't think I'll ever stay in a Hotel again!

Thanks for a great stay, David!

I really enjoyed my stay by David, the appt was really clean and he's a perfect host, well organized and very helpful. You will have all the privacy that you might need.
All you need will be already in the room: recommendations, map, wifi code, plug, umbrella, extra blanket, everything!
The bed is very comfortable, and the terrace is such a luxury to enjoy some calm after walking all the day in that big city.
The location of the appt is efficient, as its really easy to get in all the different area of Sydney (the Domain, Botanical garden, Opera House, circular quay to get the ferry, Potts point and Oxford street is just down there).
David was kindly let me do a laundry, which is great when you are traveling for a while. I will definitely stay by him again for my next trip to Sydney.
Great place to stay whilst I acclimatised to Sydney.  Great host too, made me feel welcome and provided all the info I needed to know the area.
Perfect spot in inner city Sydney - my second visit and just great! Comfortable, brilliantly located, peaceful yet moments from the action should you chose to join, and David is a great host.
I really enjoyed my stay at David's place. He is very helpful and friendly host. The room is really comfortable and clean. Definitely will stay here again if I visit Sydney one day.

David was a great host during our stay at his place in Sydney. His house is very clean, comfortable, and well located. Several nice neighborhoods are within walking distance from his place, easy access to the major sightseeing attractions by bus around the corner, affordable places to eat, bars, clubs, and much more close by. David was friendly  and we even were able to catch a few drinks with him. Great host!

I had a wonderful 4-day stay with DJ, who was very nice and welcoming. The apartment itself was perfect; clean, spacious and in a perfect location. I had my own room with air-con, TV, closets etc. and even had my own bathroom!

If you're in Sydney I can definitely recommend staying at DJ's!

I stayed in this guest room end of December for three nights. I had an excellent stay here, my first Aibnb experience. David was a great host. The room was exactly as described. Clean, very near to city centre, own bathroom, ... I have not a single thing to complain about and would stay here again, should I travel again to Sydney.

We spent a week (during New Year's Eve) at Dj place. Everything was perfect : room clean with terrace and bathroom clean. Location is very good (restaurants, bars , bus connection, etcc). Definitely a place to stay. Bye Dj

We stayed for only 3 nights, which is far too less for such a great place. Loved the little terrace, perfect connection to city and sights (we walked a lot), super internet connection, luxury textiles and even our private shower... Everything was as expected and better. David was a perfect host. We'd love to stay there again and definitely recommend it.

DJ was a very nice host.

The room and the bed are very comfortable. You get your own bathroom which is a very nice plus. The apartment is very well located, well connected in terms of public transportation. Recommended.

Had a great stay here, it was clean and spacious and had everything I needed. The location was perfect with Surry Hills and the CBD only a short walk away. If you're new to Sydney, there's plenty of advice where to go and what to see too. I highly recommend it.

We've stayed at Davids place for 7 days and it was as beautiful as in the pictures. Although we didn't see David a lot, he was a great host and provided everything we needed. 
The location is amazing; Darlinghurst is a very lively neighbourhood, though the house' location is very peaceful. Within 200 meters is a busstop that brings you to Bondi beach or the Sydney Harbour both within 15 minutes. 
Also nice is Surry Hills, a lovely neighbourhood to go out for dinner or a drink, which is located within a 10 minute walk from the residence.
We surely recommend this place!

I stayed at David's house for a few days while traveling through Sydney. He was a great host: helpful, considerate, and accommodating. He also had great tips and suggestions for exploring the area. His house is perfectly located centrally yet quietly tucked away.  On top of that, his place was just like the pics...just amazing! I would highly recommend David (and his place) as a host and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there the next time I am in Sydney!

David has a very stylish home and it is kept in excellent condition.   I especially enjoyed the patio off the bedroom.  David has his own personal guide to Sydney listing some of his favorite places which I found helpful.  Great location if you want to be in this part of the city.

I stayed at David's lovely apartment for 6 days. Upon my arrival, David showed me around and he had even put together a scrapbook with recommendations on places to eat! The apartment is exactly like what you see in the pictures. It was very clean and everything that you could possibly need to make your stay as comfortable is provided! There are a couple of nice cafés near surry hills and oxford street. It takes just a straight bus to the cbd or to the beach! David is a very nice person and it is safe to stay there for solo travelers. I highly recommend his place! Thank you for making my stay really comfortable and I really felt at home =)
The reservation was canceled 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I stayed with David for a week at the end of April  as I was between apartments.. The perfect host, an immaculate place and very quiet and peaceful. I would highly recommend it to anyone.

Great location!  David's place was really well set up and he provided us with helpful information to explore the local area.  The place helped to make our stay in Sydney relaxing and fun. We would definitely stay there again.

David and his place impressed me even before we walked up his doorstep.  Little did I know that his place was located within the gay district of Sydney, which was a huge bonus for my husband and I, and it already made us feel like we were at home.
David had an awesome place and it looked even better than what we saw in the photos, if that's even possible!  Overall his place is sleek, modern and very clean.  I love the pieces of artwork all around his place; they add just the right amount of character.   Our room was fully equipped with such great amenities including a tv, an iPod player, a balcony, and a private bathroom with not one - but TWO - showers!  I felt like my husband and I were in a candy store =)
In addition, David provided a very helpful and well-compiled visitor booklet which contained valuable information about the nearby bars and restaurants with his own descriptions and reviews of each place, and even provided maps for each section.  And let me tell you, we went to almost half of the places he recommended in the booklet and they were all AWESOME!  David definitely has great taste, and that is saying a lot.  
David even joined us for dinner during one of our nights there, where we got to know him better.   He is such a nice and friendly guy!
David went above and beyond our expectations as an airbnb host, and I would definitely recommend him to anyone who is looking for an awesome place in a centralized and convenient location in Sydney.
Thanks so much, David!

Had a great time at David's. Awesome apt...private (Website hidden by Airbnb) sure you are aware that the bedroom and the bathroom / private are on two separate floors. The place is literally a few minute walk from bars, clubs, cafes, and safe haunts.
DJ was a great host. His place is in an awesome location and bed was very comfortable.
Great place with a good bathroom and balcony. Great location - close to transport, shops and great cafes. you can walk to many designer brand shop in the Oxford street, I really love there.

David's place was very homely and welcoming. It was spotlessly clean and tidy and you feel right at home, perhaps may even make you want to refurbish your house to look like David's place.

It's nestled away in a quiet street corner but in a centrally located part of town. A short bus ride to circular quay with good bus connectivity to other popular tourist places such as Bondi. 

The room was so well equipped with a smart TV, cable, an iPod player and a balcony. For those new to air bnb and used to hotels, you will get the privacy and creature comforts of a hotel room with a homely vibe here.

David has also gone through lengths to prepare a Sydney restaurant and bar guide and so sweetly leaves you with a bar of welcome chocolate (caveat for those watching their holiday weight :D). 

Pity, I only met David on my first day. Our separate timings kept us from catching up.

David is very thoughtful, he prepared a booklet with many neighborhood eateries plus lots of notes which is very handy! The room and the house is exactly the same as shown in photos, very clean and neat, David did a great job on renovating it. The location is perfect, it is in a quiet alley and everything is within 5 mins walk, the buses is very convenient and take ppl to CBD, Bondi, Glebe, etc. Our stay with David is wonderful thanks to his hospitality.
Very nice and clean place. The room comes with cable TV. Truly hotel standard! Lots of nice cafes within walking distance. It was a really pleasant stay.

Wonderful welcome, I really appreciated, you have evrything for a perfect stay : quiet Place in a quiet Area, your own bathroom, kitchen Fully furnished, Tv with cable, and a lovely balcony.
David, Thanks for evrything

We really enjoyed our time at Davids House. It is perfectly located - very close to transport, Cafés, Shops and you can easily reach a lot of sights by relatively Short walks (Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Darling Harbour, ...)

The House/Room is very clean and Looks exactly like the pictures. Very nice room with balcony, TV, comfortable Bed and a Lot of Space to store your belongings. The bathroom also is very clean and Even bigger than expected.

David is very nice and helpfull - he can help you Out in almost every Situation. David even created a booklet, which recommends some nice Bars, Restaurants and Breakfast-Offers.

Thanks for everything, David. We really enjoyed staying with you/at your beautiful place.

We can totally recommend David and his House/Room

David was a very friendly host. The room suits all our needs: clean, comfortable bed and nice balcony. We recommand this place very much. Nice neighbourhood with lost of good restaurants. Thanks David for your hospitality.

Three reasons why you should definitely stay here:
- Perfect location: in a quiet street and yet close to both the city centre and gastronomic paradise Surry Hills. Very well served by public transport too.
- The house itself is smartly renovated, the room and your bed comfortable, and you have your own bathroom and even a terrace!
- You stay with a very attentive host. He seems to be online all the time, replying instantly, which is really practical for bookings or any further questions. And he has just thought of everything, including a charming welcoming package and a booklet with the best local spots to have breakfast, lunch, dinner, a drink...

This has been my first experience with airbnb, and a real good one!

We had a pleasant stay in David's appartment and it is a great location for exploring the city. The surroundings are very cozy with a lot of restaurants and cafe's nearby. The room was fine and clean and we especially enjoyed the adjacent balcony. David was very helpfull host when needed. We would definetly recommend the place to others. Lone & Birger

It was an awesome stay. The place is beautifully decorated and it looked totally the same in the photos. It was clean, neat and nice hospitallity by David. The place is very near town, walking to the stations was so easy.  Overall I love the stay and thank you for the stay and holding you up on the first night : ) Awesome! I will come back again.

Location, location, location! DJ's place is in a great location. The accommodations are modern , comfortable and nice. As a host DJ is great. He was very welcoming, during my entire stay I felt welcomed and at ease. I highly recommended DJ.

DJ was a nice host. He was there upon our arrival. Great location if you want the hustle and bustle of Darlinghurst. House is located in a very quite neighborhood. For two grown adults the room is a little small, plus luggage makes for a tight fit.
DJ was a fantastic host.  everything was as advertised, lived up to the other reviews, and he couldnt be more helpful.  I would absolutely stay with him again.

We had a great stay at David's place! The location is perfect...on a quiet street but only a block or so from tons of cafes, bars, shops, and restaurants. David also had some great food recommendations. Everything in the house was new and kept very clean & tidy. The terrace off of the bedroom is very nice. I definitely recommend staying here.
很好的房子,干净｡位于一条很安静的小巷子里｡位置很好,方便游玩｡房东很友善,不会干扰到你｡我们很满意!very good!

It was really a nice and pleasant stay. The place is very neat and tidy and its exactly in the pictures! Dj was very accommodating and very flexible with the check in time as well. I appreciate it. Thank you for letting me stay David!

David's place is an adorable fully renovated Victorian double story shop front/terrace with all the mod cons. It is so incredibly central making for a quick walk to all the best Cafes and restaurants in Surry Hills. The location was perfect for me as I was in Sydney on business so was able to schedule a lot of my business meetings over coffee - David's location subsequently made my time very efficient. Upon arrival David provided clear instructions on the house amenities. He graciously provided a bottle of red wine (which I didn't drink but the thought was very much appreciated). We didn't see a lot of each other due to our busy work schedules. I unfortunately left my wallet at David's when I was in  rush to leave so he offered to post this to me in Victoria. 
His house is spotlessly clean and I loved having cable tv available in the room when I just wanted to chill out for a while. The house is located behind busy Taylor square but it get like it was locked away in a private suburb - there was no evidence of any street noise at all. A little oasis in a very busy intersection of Oxford and Flinders st. I look forward to having the chance to stay with David again in future.

David was a great host. We had a lot of privacy and the house is fantastic! It's a very beautiful home and is located nearby to everything you could want and only a short stroll to the city. Brilliant.

David was really welcoming and the room is well appointed. The property is well renovated and designed with downstairs guest bathroom a massive bonus. 
Location is unbeatable, and I've decided to stay again.

Great property, great facilities and awesome location. 
David was really welcoming and hospitable and very responsive to any questions or concerns. 
No hesitation in recommending this property. Would definitely stay again.

Wir haben die Zeit bei DJ sehr genossen. Das Haus ist perfekt gelegen - ganz in der Nähe von Cafés, Geschäften und man kommt sogar zu Fuß in die Stadt/zur Oper (oder mit einem der unzähligen Busse). Das Haus/Zimmer ist sehr sauber und sieht genauso aus wie auf den Bildern. DJ ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit, wenn wir ihn gebraucht haben, war er jederzeit da, ohne dass man zu sehr aufeinander sitzt.  Danke für alles!
We really enjoyed our time at DJs House. It is perfectly located - very close to transport, Cafés, Shops and you can easily reach a lot of sights by relatively short walks. The house/room is very clean and looks exactly like the pictures. DJ is a very nice and helpfull guy and helped us when ever needed! Thanks for all!
David is nice, the house is well located,15 mins walk to Chinatown and hydepark. I will choose next time.
David was a great host. Everything need was provided. Room was clean and cosy all bars were in walking distance. I had a great time in Sydney. I can highly recommend his place. Thumbs up!

Dj is a nice host who provided warmest welcome and great hospitality. He self created a guide book to show me where to eat, to see and what to do in Sydney. He helped me to do laundry twice during my 5 day stay. He is place is well deco and quiet at night. The bed is extremely comfortable and I had good sleep every night. A nice place and I recommend his place to whoever Travelling to Sydney!

Great stay with DJ! Place was in a great location, cool historic building from 1860's, very clean house, and DJ provided loads of amenities including an entire professional guide to the city, which I took full advantage of & had a blast doing so! Thanks again DJ for hosting in your perfect spot!!

Me and my friend had a week in Sydney over New Years. It was very hard to find a place to stay, but DJ was quick and easy to communicate with! We enjoyed the location of the house because it's walking distance to the inner city and has easy access to beaches by buss. David is very kind and helpful, and he has made a great guide for what you can do in Sydney and some popular bars/restaurants. Our experience of the city and the house was good, although it rained a lot... We don't know what we would have done without the huge umbrellas you provided haha. Would definitely stay at your place again if I'm ever in Sydney again. 

Thank you for your hospitality.

I stayed for DJ for 2 and a half weeks.
The pics are accurate, the place is immaculate and clean and quiet, the location is incredible, and DJ was very helpful. I must admit found the layout of the guest bathroom odd...you have to walk down the stairs and kind of go through the lounge to get to it. Some people may be comfortable with that. I wasn't. 
One negative, and it was a big shock with me being from London, was that I came home one day and there were tons of tiny spiders on the wall of my room, that must have come in from the patio. I managed to spray as many as I could, but I must have missed a few as the following few days I kept seeing bigger and bigger spiders in the room. I told DJ about it and he cleaned the dead spiders and spray off the walls, but really what should have happened is that the room should have been fumigated the next day, or I should have recieved some kind of compensation.
I guess spiders are not seen as a big deal in Australia. 
So overall good, except for the spiders.
Wonderful stay! David was very hospitable and it was as if we had the entire place to ourselves. Would definitely return!

Ich hatte das Zimmer bei David für eine Woche gebucht.
Alles war wie beschrieben bzw. auf den Fotos abgebildet, sehr schön und sauber. Die Lage ist optimal, um die Stadt zu erkunden, Bushaltestelle gleich ums Haus, dennoch ist das Zimmer selbst ruhig, so dass man gut schlafen kann.
Wer ein Zimmer im CBD sucht, ist hier richtig.
David war bemüht, mir zu helfen, wenn ich eine Frage hatte und sehr höflich.
Danke David!
Great house, great location and a great host.

I spent a week at David's house. I must say this is by far and away the best place I have ever stayed. His house is very nice, modern decoration, very clean, close to bus stops, cafés, restaurants and a walking distance from CBD. The room is clean and spacious with a very comfortable bed, cable tv, air conditioner, a large balcony. The bathroom is very clean and the shower is perfect. Adapters for Australian plug is available in the room (although I had mine, I think it was very kind of him for supplying it to guests). David was very kind. I give this a mark of 10 out of 10. I would definitely stay at David's house again. Thank you very much.

Dj was very helpful and kind. Het made me feel very welcome. There was a welcome bottleneck of wine and information about the neighbourhood. The room was exactly as described with a comfortable bed and netflix. I had a great stay and would absolutely book here again!

The place was really nice and in such an ideal location close to a lot of attractions and just a quick commute away from the CBD, among other places to visit. It was clean, convenient, and had good space. I also liked that I had my own bathroom. Overall I would say David's place is a recommendable one if you're looking for a place to stay in Sydney.
Thank you David for being such a wonderful host. Got me settled in pretty quick and was helpful in answering my queries promptly

Stayed here for  2 weeks. The place is as the pictures depict. Overall  a comfortable stay with all the  amenities a business or casual traveller would need.David is a nice and accomodative host. Would stay here again.

I had a wonderful stay at David's home. What an incredible location literally on the doorstep of Flinders St and Oxford St (including many of the most well-known gay bars/clubs), and yet so quiet. From there you can also pretty much get yourself anywhere in Sydney really easily and quickly. The property is exactly as described, and if anything, had a few pleasant surprises in terms of the various things he provided. Oh, and the bed is super comfy. I didn't have much opportunity to interact with David (as I was mainly seeing friends and attending a wedding), but he provided everything I needed and was really nice and flexible. I would very happily stay with David again the next time I'm in Sydney.

Private balcony, aircon, Fox, Apple TV
Quality linen and lush towels
Very close to Oxford Street and public transport 
David is friendly and a very food host.

David is such a lovely host - and was really kind and accomodating. The house is lovely, and the room has the most beautiful terrace roof. The location is brilliant, and so easy to walk from. Everything is set up great, and I'd be so happy to stay again any time!

David's place was great.  It's a super cool place with some very fun artwork and it's right around the corner from Oxford Street which has a ton of bars and restaurants.  The place was incredibly clean.  The bedroom has a door directly out to a terrace which was great as well.  David was very responsive and a great host.  He had a great booklet of suggestions on things to do, places to eat, etc., and even joined in on a trip to the bar.  Very respectful of space and very pleasant to be around!

Definitely will recommend this place to friends and family that visit.
David's place is awesome, amazing location and I loved my little morning routine of doing yoga in the sun on the patio outside my room. David was lovely and very easy going, he is a gentlemen.
David was an excellent host. Very helpful and respectful. The location was great and the home was welcoming and tidy. Couldn't be happier with the experience and service provided.
David was a very flexible and accommodating host. He was very communicative and understanding.
It's clean , close to everything ,best place to stay and highly recommend  it to anyone visit in Sydney  :)
David is a friendly and forthcoming host!
David is a great host and the place is closed to public transport and the CBD.   Definitely would recommend this place to my friends (btw, thx so much for chasing away the spider)

David was a lovely host. My check in plans kept changing on my behalf and he remained super flexible. The location is unbeatable - super close to shops, cafes and safely located to walk to and from. The private tv and netflix was a real treat - I may have binge watched a night or two free from judgement. David was a lovely warm host throughout my 4night stay. 110% recommended :)

David's place was a great find. Lovely house with everything you need, and very close to all the tourist sites. The book of recommendations was a lovely touch. Would highly recommend to other visitors!
Great first stay in an AirBnB - David was easy to communicate with, friendly, and the checkin process was a breeze. The house and the room were great, in a perfect location and very neat and tidy.

David is truly SUPERhost! I loved everything about his place! Location (just 2mins from Oxford Street, walking distance to Hyde Park, public transportation to City/Bondi/Central within minute of walk) his renovated house with all comfort and extra touches. Staying at David’s means to have responsive host who pays attention to his guests and privacy or friendly chat (as desired). 
I enjoyed my stay at David’s and it’s definitely right spot to stay in Sydney! 
Hope to be back again soon!

Gabriela

I stayed at David's place for 3 nights for Mardi Gras weekend and it was a perfect place for me  being close (walking distance) to restaurants, bars and public transportation. David was a great host, very communicative and he also helped me check-in early once I arrived from my cruise.

The bed was comfortable and the bedroom has air conditioning for extra comfort. The bathroom being in the first floor does create a little bit of inconvenience but this is stated in his listing very clear and was not a surprise. I highly recommend David's place and would stay again in future trips to Sydney.
David has a really stylish apartment in a great location. It looks exactly like the pictures.  David went out of his way to be accomodating and I really enjoyed my stay.

Very lovely home!! 
We had a great time staying at this lovely home, also we did try the bar recommendation at the welcome book, such a cool chill place to be with friends at night!

Perfekt gelegen, in wenigen Minuten zum öffentlichen Nahverkehr, Cafés etc., ruhig und doch mittendrin.
Tolle Tipps von David.

neighborhood_overview: Laranjeiras é um dos bairros mais antigos da cidade, e é onde estão situados o  Palácio Guanabara, sede do Governo do Estado do Rio de Janeiro, o Palácio Laranjeiras, residência oficial do Governador do Estado do Rio de Janeiro, o Parque Guinle e o Fluminense Football Club. Bairro tipicamente residencial, de classe média alta e classe alta, tem a Rua das Laranjeiras como a sua principal via, a qual começa no Largo do Machado e termina nas imediações do Túnel Rebouças, já com outro nome: Rua Cosme Velho. Ao contrário do que se pensa, o nome do bairro não vem da existência de grandes laranjais na parte baixa do vale do Rio Carioca e sim da sua semelhança com a acidentada região de Laranjeiras na região mais alta de Lisboa, o que levou à nomeação do bairro carioca. Laranjeiras ainda guarda o charme dos bairros marcados pelo passado e foi o endereço de nobres, escritores, compositores e pessoas ilustres, como Villa-Lobos, Cecília Meirelles, Portinari, Oscar Niemeyer e Cássia Eller

reviews.comments:
I stayed in Lei & Maree's apartment for 6 nights and I enjoyed every second of it. I haven't met Lei, but Maree was there from the second I checked in. She is the most wonderful host with love for details and a desire to make her guests' stay as agreeable as possible. She has prepared the room so nicely and I felt welcome from the minute I set foot into the apartment. The view from the balcony is a dream. I could have spent my entire time - and longer - only sitting on the comfortable spot and looking at the view day and night. It is a dream.
The location couldn't be better. It is close to all amenities and not in the part of Waikiki that is too crowded and packed with tourists. There are excellent eateries around that provide good food for agreeable prices and the Hilton Hawaiian Village is only a few hundert meters away where there is a firework every Friday night; plus the lagoon is also closeby which is not as crowded as the main beach. Still you can walk to Waikiki beach and the shopping street as it is all close (or take the Waikiki trolley; it's only 2$ one way).
In the house itself there is also a pool, sauna and gym. I have to admit that I have only used the pool and that was very relaxing as there was noone around.
To sum it up, I would always go back to Lei and Maree's and recommended to all guests. Thank you for making my Hawaiian experience so enjoyable!

The place is awesome, at a very good location and has everything you need to stay there.
I was really touched by the hospitality shown. They are just awesome people, took great care, keep on checking, suggested various places to visit and we had good conversations on variety of topics.
Over all amazing stay, they are super hosts.

name: Matosinhos Beach Apartment
summary: Located at only a 2 min walk from the beach, this comfortable and luxurious apartment stands on one of Matosinhos busiest and most historical streets. Whether you decide to stay here to keep away from the loud city life of Porto, while still being at a metro ride away, or whether you really cannot spend much time away from the beach and the ocean, we are sure you will love to spend some time in this modern and cosy apartment!
space: The apartment has 2 spacious bedrooms, a study that can be converted into a spare room,  a fully equipped kitchen area, as well as a massive living and dining room for you to kick back and relax. The entire apartment is work-friendly, with USB and electrical outlets in all rooms, as well as desks and state-of the art TV screens.

notes: LATE CHECK-IN  - Guests whose check-in is between 21:00 and 23:00 pm have to pay an extra fee of 15 euros. And guests that check-in  after 23:00 have to pay an extra fee of 30 euros.
transit: This very busy street gives way for a quite residential atmosphere at night. It is located right in the heart of Matosinhos Sul, in front of the sea and right around the corner from beach bars, fish restaurants and surf schools! It is also at walking distance to the beautiful beaches of Matosinhos and Leça, where you can find true Porto people surfing and enjoying the sun! If you stay at this apartment and you enjoy strolling around an undiscovered city, you can take a long walk along the shore to Foz, where you can see the beautiful Porto sea side! From there, you can take the historical tram or a bus to the city center! If you don't feel like walking, just step outside, get in the metro and exit at Trindade, the central station of Oporto's metropolitan area!
interaction: We are always looking for new ways to make your stay as enjoyable as possible! Starting from your arrival, we will welcome you in the apartment and introduce to you Porto´s cultural agenda, unique tour opportunities and transportation methods. Among any other information you may wish to know.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Recommended for young travelers on a budget. The space is a room with 12 beds. The door to each bed can be closed for privacy. Each room comes with lights, a power outlet, USB plugs, and fans, and there's enough vertical room to sit on the bed. We stayed when there were 8 people, but it was still quiet and peaceful for so many people. There are three toilets and showers, and many lockers. Chile was very friendly, responsive, and helpful. The location is convenient, with the nearest bus stop (the 720 line to Central) a minute outside the door, and five minutes from the MTR station. Overall a good experience!
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: FLAT EM  FRENTE  À  PRAIA DA BARRA, RJ  - BRASIL
summary: O Flat fica localizado em frente à praia da Barra da Tijuca, próximo ao posto 07. Possui um quarto para casal, banheiro, sala com TV, sofá cama, mini cozinha e varanda com vista para o mar. A praia está bem próxima e para chegar basta atravessar a rua. Na praia existe a possibilidade de  alugar cadeiras e  barracas.  Os quiosques oferecem água de coco, petiscos, sanduíches, refeições e  bebidas.  A área é propícia para prática de esportes como caminhada, bicicleta, surf, vôlei e frescobol.
space: O apartamento possui  uma sala  com  mesa com 4 cadeiras, sofá cama,  móveis para suporte de TV de 42", mini cozinha completa com geladeira, fogão, sanduicheira, cafeteira  e utensílios completos.  O quarto de casal possui 2 camas de solteiros juntas, armário amplo e mesa lateral na cama. Os ambientes possuem cortinas com  blackout,  ar condicionado e o piso do flat é frio. O apartamento é claro, limpo  e arejado.  Tem uma varanda ampla com vista para o mar. Nas áreas comuns do prédio La Reserve encontramos piscina, churrasqueira,  sala de ginástica e brinquedoteca. O flat tem internet com wifi 35 mega gratuita e TV com canais fechados.  O banheiro possui água aquecida e ducha higiênica.

neighborhood_overview: A localização do Flat é privilegiada estando em uma das áreas mais bem valorizadas da Barra da Tijuca. Ao lado  do prédio temos um excelente restaurante chamado Holandaise  ( cozinha internacional ) que oferece pratos variados de saladas, carnes, massas,  vinho e chop. Pode-se encontrar tb bem próximo padaria gourmet, farmácia, caixa eletrônico 24 horas e lanchonete excelente ( Golden Sulcos e Golden Deli ).  No caso de compras para apto temos o supermercado zona sul que fica aberto 24 horas. Na Barra temos vários shoppings como o Village  Mall, Barra Shopping, Rio de Design, Vogue e Via Parque onde pode-se não só fazer compras porém conhecer excelentes restaurantes e cinemas.   A rua Olegário Maciel possui diversos restaurantes e bares para distração e vida noturna. O Shopping Vogue, também, possui  estas características com diversos bares e restaurantes.
notes: Os hóspedes poderão desfrutar de ambiente confortável e limpo tendo acesso a internet gratuita e TV com canais fechados a cabo que oferecem diversas programações. O prédio disponibiliza áreas comuns como piscina, churrasqueira e sala de ginástica. Ao redor encontramos apoio para diversas necessidades como restaurantes, caixas eletrônicos, supermercados e farmácia.
transit: Para ter acesso as opções próximas ao prédio o ideal é se locomover a pé. No caso de querer ir ao shopping ou outros passeios mais distantes deve-se utilizar o carro.
access: Os hóspedes tem acesso a garagem com direito a uma vaga, piscina, churrasqueira, brinquedoteca e sala de ginástica.
interaction: Estou sempre disponível para ajudar e tirar dúvidas dos hóspedes por telefone e (Hidden by Airbnb) . Também, posso disponibilizar o email.

reviews.comments: We loved the location of the apartment! So close to everything. The apartment was clean and the bed was comfortable. The host was really nice because she gave us recommandations of things to do and was available for questions. host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Músico, Professor Universitário.

reviews.comments:
2 Brazilian friends and I decided to go to Rio for Réveillon. We came across this posting for Edilberto’s accommodations and reached out. He was very responsive and very helpful. The apartment was spacious, clean, with all the amenities needed for our 3 day stay. It is in a safe area, which is key in Rio, and literally walking distance from the subway which was perfect to get around. On Sundays there is a farmers market which is right outside, bringing local fruits, vegetables, and meats. In addition there are supermarkets along with sit down and fast food restaurants within walking distance. Also an Uber makes anything accessible. I would definitely stay with Edilberto again. I found him pleasant, friendly, and accommodating. 

Eu e mais dois amigos brasileiros decidimos ir para o Rio de Janeiro passar o Réveillon. Encontramos este apartamento do Edilberto. Um apartamento espaçoso, limpo e com todas as comodidades necessárias para a nossa estadia de 3 dias. Situado na Tijuca em uma área residencial segura, o que é fundamental no Rio, e com a conveniência do metrô acessível 3 quadras do endereço. Aos domingos, acontece uma feira de produtores na rua logo em frente, com frutas, verduras, legumes e carnes... Além disso, existem supermercados, padarias e restaurantes a uma curta distância. O Uber também faz qualquer lugar acessível. Eu definitivamente ficaria hospedado no apartamento do Edilberto novamente. Um anfitrião agradável, amigável e complacente.

Lugar mto agradável em todos os sentidos.. o bairro em si, a localização, o apartamento, os cômodos, a facilidade de acesso pelos dois aeroportos, local estratégico pra quem, como eu e minha família, gosta de ir nos lugares com os melhores sambas do RJ!!!
Amamos e sempre que voltarmos ao RJ, tentaremos nos hospedar no apê do Edilberto novamente..

Sr. Edilberto foi muito simpático e solícito. O prédio e a localização é super tranquila e fica pertinho do metrô. O apartamento estava super limpinho e é espaçoso, foi ótimo para pernoitar com minha família.

name: Cozy house 10 min from SAW airport w/ King Bed
summary: İstanbul Original Bed no Breakfast. Nice family house, open pool, Free carparking, with public transport in the neighborhood (5 minute walk). Airport is nearby 10 min, Tuzla seaside is 45 min with bus, downtown is around 80 min with bus and metro. Supermarket is nearby. Rooms available for couples, families with kids and people who are travelling for business. Free parking for your car.
space: A characteristic house, built in a quiet green area with lighted area. It's at a walking distance from the public transport (with the bus and metro you will be in the city center in 45 / 60 minutes). The entrance is at the ground floor. You enter in the open and light kitchen where you can cook and eat. You can use all kitchen utenils for cooking, as long as you leave as you find. Electrical oven, microwave and fridge are also available. Next to the kitchen there is the cozy living room with a nice couch where you can sit and relax. The garden has accessible view from the living room where you can enjoy the weather. There is a relaxing aquarium, please do not disturb animals. 1 bedroom with 1 king bed and 1 bedroom with a single bed that can be used by the guests. Next to the bedrooms you have the bathroom with a walk-in shower and toilet, washer and hairdryer. There is a little storage and it is not allowed for the guests.

house_rules: - No smoking or drugs in the house. There are smoke and carbon monoxide detectors. You can smoke on the garden side door. - No parties, this is Turkey there are rules about making noise after 11 PM it is strictly forbidden to make noise or play loud music after 11 PM. - Please respect our neighbors around the house do not bother them.  - Always make sure the garden door and the front door is locked when you go to sleep or leave the house.  - Losing the keys will cost you 50 euros because we have to change the lock and buy new keys - When the trash can is full, please do not put it on the streets. There is collection time 8am and 5 pm, you can put in front of the door. - Please do not wear the shoes inside the house, and leave the place like your home. - No extra people allowed / invited / sleeping then what is agreed on. - Unbooked/unregistered guests on the property are grounds for immediate  cancellation for trespassing.

neighborhood_overview: As part of the surrounding, you can easily find markets, bakery, shopping areas, and the famous Agora Tavern is just by the next street. Fener Rum Orthodox Church is 200 meters walking distance. Just in front of the building, there is historical and traditional Minaret Hammam (Turkish bath in a wooden building) and Mosque which are built reminiscence of the Ottoman Empire.
notes: Balat Park also is near and if you have kids they can play there. -	Markets, restaurants, coffee places and a lot of shops just in 1-2 minutes walking time. - Fener Rum Orthodox Church and many other historical Mosques also near. All building is surrounded by security cameras..
transit: Bus station and ferry station just 30 seconds by walk.Every 2 min. you can take bus to KARAKÖY - EMİNÖNÜ - TAKSİM - YENİKAPI- AKSARAY Here you can look around the  historical neighborhoods Fener Balat and spend your day getting lost in the fascinating streets. Here the houses are painted in all kind of colours and laundry is still hanging across the narrow streets, kids still play football in the streets rather than on a Playstation, and many different cultures and religions live next to each other. If you’re the kind of tourist who likes to get away from the crowds, then a walking tour around Fener-Balat is your best bid!
access: We are available in our coffee in the ground floor, with two front entries where we serve all kinds of goodies, homemade desserts, freshly squeezed juices and lemonades and of course the famous Turkish Tea and coffee.
interaction: We enjoy having you in our coffee in the ground floor for breakfast, drinks, and desserts or just for long talks about different lifestyles and diverse cultures.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I work with Communications and I love what I do.  I live alone as I am single, I don´t smoke and I have a lot of friends all over the world. I love traveling and I speak  Portuguese, English, Spanish and a little French. Although I travel  a lot, whenever I have an opportunity I love enjoying all the attractions Rio has to offer. I enjoy going out with my friends, specially to Samba clubs and to Lapa, playing drums in “blocos de Carnaval” and whenever is possibile go outrigger canoeing in Guanabara Bay.  I love running or riding my long skateboard in different areas of the city and of course, I enjoy  a lot the beaches and the city parks with their waterfalls. It will be a pleasure to show you a bit of what Rio has to offer.

Yo trabajo con Comunicaciones y me encanta lo que hago. Soy soltero  y vivo sólo, no fumo y tengo un montón de amigos de diferentes partes del mundo. Me encanta viajar  y hablo portugués, Inglés, español y un poco de francés . Viajo bastante pero siempre que tengo la oportunidad me encanta disfrutar de todas las atracciones de Río. Me gusta salir con mis amigos, especialmente a las ruedas de samba y a la Lapa, tocar em la batería de  "blocos de Carnaval" y siempre que possibile ir en canoa outrigger en la Bahía de Guanabara. Me gusta correr o andar em mi skateboard  en diferentes zonas de la ciudad y, por supuesto, me encantan las playas y los parques de Rio con sus cascadas. Será un placer mostrarte un poco de lo que Río tiene para ofrecer.

reviews.comments: Boa noite, super recomendo. Carlos é um ótimo anfitrião, atencioso, gente boa, sempre disponível quando precisa de alguma informação. Apartamento e quarto super confortável, ótima localização. Parabéns Carlos, e o obrigado pela confiança depositada em mim.
O bairro é bom, de fácil acesso para 2 estações de metrô. A estadia foi maravilhosa, o lugar é lindo e a receptividade do anfitrião não poderia ter sido melhor!

O Carlos é muito simpático, alegre e foi super solícito, estando disponível antes mesmo de chegarmos ao Rio, montando uma programação e nos dando dicas ótimas sobre a cidade. O apartamento é super aconchegante, limpo e bem decorado. A experiência no Rio foi fantástica e boa parte disso se deve ao nosso anfitrião!

Also easy access from the International Airport, with special shuttle drop off two doors down from the apartment building (Premium auto bus that goes to the major hotels).  The apartment is also 12 mins away from the Santos Dumont airport and downtown Rio. There is also a taxi stop two doors down from the building. I am the owner of the apartment, and I live a few minutes away from the building.  I will be accessible anytime via e-mail or phone. neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located directly across from the old Presidential Palace, "Palacio do Catete", with views of the beautiful presidential garden where you can take tai-chi-chuan classes in the early morning.  The palace also hosts a movie theatre, theatre, exhibition hall, and restaurant. Alongside the beach (6 mins walk), there are jogging trails, soccer, tennis and volleyball courts at your disposal.  The apartment is also within  walking distance from many restaurants, other theatres, banks, pharmacy, groceries and nightlife.
notes: We are also 10 mins away from one of Rio's hottest spots, the artsy and trendy Santa Teresa neighborhood, where you can spend the day viewing exhibitions from local artists, in museums, restaurants, and also experience one of the best night scenes in Rio.
transit: Easy access from and to the subway, local bus lines and shuttles from the airports, and in a great location in the south zone of Rio, near downtown.  We are 10 mins subway ride to Copacabana and 20 mins from Ipanema beaches.  The Christ Statute and Sugar loaf are a short 12 mins car ride away.

Small pets will be allowed with a small surcharge.

reviews.comments: Todo excelente Catarina nos atendio muy bien, es una excelente anfitriona!!! El departamento es de muy comoda ubicacion para recorrer todo Rio de janeiro, ademas es muy comodo para habitar. Muy muy recomendable
Correu tudo bem, dentro das expectativas, já conhecia o bairro e a região, ambos privilegiados. Catarina foi excelente anfitriã, gentil e atenciosa.

El departamento es muy agradable, bien decorado, tiene una vista increible al mar y a los morros. Todos los electrodomesticos estan en perfecto estado de funcionamiento.
La dueña es muy amable y predispuesta para cualquier consulta que uno necesite.
El barrio es seguro, cuenta con todo tipo de comercios, locales gastronomicos, subte y colectivos.

This was the perfect place for my recent stay in Rio.  The view is really amazing, and the neighborhood was just what I was looking for.  The apartment is cozy and has everything you might need.  Catarina is a wonderful host, kind and easy to communicate with.  She made me feel very welcome with her hospitality.  I can definitely recommend her home to other travelers.

Muito bom apartamento, limpo, elegante, tudo funciona bem. Mas a melhor coisa é a localização - na minha opinião, não há muitos melhores localizações no Rio. Catarina foi simpática e prestativa e comunicação foi bom.

Very nice apartment, clean, stylish, everything works well. But the best thing is the location - in my opinion, there are not many better locations in Rio. Catarina was friendly and helpful and communication was good.

We had a great time staying in the apartment! The view is indeed beautiful and the apartment has everything you need! Catarina went out of her way to ensure we had were able to navigate to and from the apartment with no issues. Flamengo is a great neighborhood. Highly recommend the apartment and the hostess!

Fiquei hospedado durante dois meses no apartamento da Catarina. A estadia foi ótima. Não há o que reclamar. O apartamento tem uma vista fantástica, é confortável, próximo a praia, restaurantes e ao transporte publico. A Catarina também é uma ótima anfitriã, muito atenciosa. Recomendo e voltaria de novo.

Catarina was very welcoming and nice: she gave us many advices to have a great stay.
The flat is comfortable with everything we need, and it is so close to the Flamengo beach.
Fomos bem recebidos e a localização é ótima (perto de restaurantes, bancos, estação Catete do metrô e mercado). Voltarei alugar lá.

Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials—everything you need for an exceptional stay. Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay. There's plenty to offer within walking distance.
