neighborhood_overview: There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Satisfy your foodie desires with farm-fresh Italian dining just across the street at Le Richmond, or sample juicy steaks and boutique wines at Grinder Viandes & Vins. For shopping, head to the Underground City where you can easily spend a day wandering one of the world's largest underground complexes. To explore the rest of the city, hop on the Metro at nearby Lucien L'Allier Station. Just south of Downtown and west of Old Montreal, Griffintown is part of Montreal's Sud-Ouest. Located near the historic waterfront, it’s a hip up-and-coming neighborhood full of five-star restaurants, cool cafés, and industrial architecture.
notes: This Sonder does not have cable, but with our Chromecast enabled television you can easily stream your favorite content or music through a phone, tablet, or laptop. Due to new development you may encounter some construction noise. Vacation Rental License No.: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Drivers can find paid parking options nearby, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

name: Entire 1 bedroom apt. in Town Mount-Royal
summary: We have a cozy place, minimal decoration yet comfortable with everything you need. Wifi, tea and coffee is provided, as well as access to Netflix.  There is a big bedroom with a king size bed and there will be 2 drawers that you can use for your own personal things.  In the living room we have a desk, couch (one person can sleep on it), a TV and access to the balcony. There is a small dining table, and it is extendable to 4 ppl. Full equipped kitchen is available so you can cook your meals.
space: There is no TV cable. We have a Playstation 3 that you can use for DVD, Blueray and Netflix. There is an HDMI cable available if you want to connect something else to it. Great Tassimo coffee will be provided (1 per guest per day) and different selection of tea. We have sugar, salt, pepper, oil and other essentials for cooking.

name: Taksim, Beyoğlu, Turkey Deluxe Room Sq. 3 Min.Walk
summary: Located in Taksim, Deluxe Room is within a walking distance from lively Istiklal Street, which houses many cafés, restaurants, shopping malls and art galleries. Free WiFi access is provided in all areas.
space: Situated in Taksim, the room is within walking distance of the lively Istiklal Caddesi, home to many cafes, restaurants, shopping malls and art galleries. All areas have free Wi-Fi access. All accommodation is equipped with flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and a minibar. An electric kettle is also available. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and a towel. Taksim Metro Station is also a short walk away, providing easy access to the central parts of the city. A shuttle service can be arranged for an additional fee from Istanbul Atatürk Airport, 20 km away from the accommodation.

name: Enchanting Oasis, nestled in Downtown Montreal
summary: Admire the stunning city views from floor-to-ceiling glass in this enchanting tranquil space. Designed with a slow pace in mind, our hope is that you enjoy every part of your stay; from making coffee in the morning, to relaxing in the sitting room. This space features a deep soaking tub and peaceful. Guests also have access to the building’s lavish Jacuzzi. The Old Port is a short walk southwards, or just enjoy the downtown shopping, also steps away from Palais Des Congrès and Place des Arts.

host.host_about: Montreal

reviews.comments: Very great place and host
Je le recommande a tout le monde. Très bel appartement et bien situé. J’ai aimé chaque moment. Je reviendrai sûrement
Great stay. 10 out of 10!

Nice clean place in a good location for downtown Montreal. Very relaxing place and nicely decorated.  Underground parking is very narrow if you plan on driving/renting a spot. Shower head makes showering difficult but I mostly enjoyed and used the soaker tub which was very nice. Hot tub is great as well. Btw - no microwave if that matters!
Appartement confortable et très bien situé pour des activités au centre-ville!

This place is even more spectacular in person. The host is prompt with his responses. He's a fingertip away and always pleasant to communicate with. Great location and very comfortable living space.  Had a latte before departing which was a great touch to the already amazing place . amazing service all together. I will definitely book again !
Merci Phil pour ta disponibilité ce fut un super séjour , très bien situé au cœur du centre ville. Tout était parfait.
Beautiful apartment in a great part of the city. Very zen! Phil was very accommodating and responded to questions quickly.
I had a great time staying here, beautiful place in a good location and Phil was a great host answering all the questions I had, for sure coming back to stay here:)
Emplacement, tranquilité et propreté exceptionnels. Je le recommande !

Phil’s space was very nice. Clean, comfy, thoughtful touches etc. If you are planning on booking a parking spot, be prepared to have a hard time getting to your spot. Make sure you don’t drive a truck! Very tight parking, had to make a 3 point turn at every corner. It was also a one way so cars are coming in and out. Other than that, the stay was good and would stay again. Great location, and many different things to do around the area.

So worth it! The place was beautiful, clean and very convenient. Liked all the small touches, you’ll see what I talk about when you book the place. We live in Montreal and wanted a little escape for the weekend and that’s exactly what we got.
Phil was amazing. I didn’t need anything it was all there. The apartment is beautiful and so are the views. I definitely will come back.
Superbe logement !

Second time staying in one of Phil’s apartments, loved every single minute of it. His response time was 10min or under. Location was perfect, the view and all the natural sunlight was wonderful & the aesthetic of the apartment was nothing short of beautiful. Can safely say I will always try to book one of Phil’s places before any others when staying in Montreal from now on. 
10/10
Endroit très zen et au goût du jour. Communication facile, instructions claires. Bon rapport qualité/prix.
Very clean and chic!
Great place will be back!
Great spot! Cant go wrong!
Very well located and beautiful condo !

This apartment was absolutely amazing and in a great location. It was beautiful. The soaking tub was perfect. And the floor to ceiling windows were wonderful to overlook the city on a nice snowy day. We woke up every morning and made coffee using their espresso machine. After a long walk, would sit in the soaking tub with a glass of wine. And they had very comfortable linen robes available. I would 100% stay here and recommend this apartment to everyone.

This is a very lovely and calming space. We really enjoyed the amazing deep soaking tub and a beautiful view of the St-Patrick’s Church from the kitchen window. The location of the loft is perfect for touring and dining. The kitchen is not fully equipped for cooking, but there’s so much to explore just walking distance from the loft. My partner and I had a great stay :)
We very much enjoyed our stay in Montreal. The apartment is centrally located and easy to get around the city. The apartment was as described ... modern and clean.
Un appartement pleins de charme
This place is dope!

Absolutely stunning place, even more beautiful in person! Phil was a great host, very hands on with great communication! The location is great, I would highly recommend his place and I would definitely come back!
Fantastic apartment. So homey, beautifully decorated and cozy!  Communal hot tub on the 3 floor! Would definitely stay here again!

The place was not only beautiful and in a great central location, it was also spotless! The owners answered all my questions very quickly and with great detail: they seemed to be available for their customers at all times of the day. In the living room, there was a booklet with information regarding restaurants, places to visit and attractions nearby. The jacuzzi was one of the best amenities of the building: it was a great relaxing and quiet spot. I have nothing to add or to suggest, as the Oasis was truly the perfect romantic cozy getaway. Thank you so much!!!!
Was an amazing host! Extremely fast response time. Very helpful and pleasant to deal with. Highly recommend staying here!
Je le recommande fortement! Communication facile avec l’hôte et très bien situé.
We could not be more pleased. The place was beautiful. Great location and friendly professional service.

host.host_about: I used to be a software engineer and now I plan events and organize bachelor party trips full time. When I'm not "working" I'm raising my two crazy kids with my life partner Rebecca. Love Montreal and have had plenty of good times all over the city. We have amazing food, amazing shows, amazing things to see...all around I can just say I am super lucky to live here and am happy to share it with people from all over the world. If you're planning a trip feel free to reach out with any questions you may have. I am happy to help. A bientot!
